[\[1b.1\]{D2092}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_nA ma saM gI ti br-it+ti nA ma ar+tha pra sa ka kA ra Na dI pa nA ma/_bod skad du/_mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i 'grel pa mtshan don gsal bar byed pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba/_
[\[1b.2\]]'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/zab cing rgya che'i sku mnga' ba'i/_/'jam pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal te/_/skal ldan rnal 'byor gang zhig gis/_/rje btsun mtshan brjod rtogs bya'i
[\[1b.3\]]phyir/_/bshad pa'i rgyud dang gdams ngag la/_/brten te 'bad pas bshad par bya/_/bshad tshul lnga yi sgo phye la/_/ji snyed rigs rnams drug bsdus te/_/phan yon bcas pa bshad pa yin/_/de la
[\[1b.4\]]'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i mtshan ji ltar yin pa rtogs par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas dbang po rab 'bring gsum du 'gyur te/_rab la bka' rgyud mdo'i bdag nyid can 'di'i mtshan bshad par bya/_'bring
[\[1b.5\]]la gzhung dbu zhabs kyi dbye ba bstan par bya/_/tha mal yi ge 'bru re re nas bstan par bya'o/_/de la dris lan gyi tshul du bshad pa dang /_mtha' sdud gsum gyi tshul du bshad pa ni don gnas skabs su sbyar
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]bar bya'o/_/de la dbang po rab mgo smos pas go ba rnams kyi don du rgyud kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa ni/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa zhes pa 'dis bstan te/_de la 'phags pa ni gnyis te/_/_
[\[2a.2\]]brjod bya don gyi sgo nas 'phags pa dang /_rjod byed tshig gi sgo nas 'phags pa'o/_/de yang ji ltar bsnams na rab dku la/_myangs na zhim pa'i sman bzhin du/_/chos kyang de bzhin gnyis su gnas/_/don dang yi ger shes par bya/_/_
[\[2a.3\]]zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/de la brjod bya don gyi sgo nas 'phags pa ni/_rje btsun nyid la 'khor ba'i mtha' dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha' gnyis las 'phags te/_mtha' gnyis la zhen pa ni sgrib pa med pa yin te/_'di gnyis
[\[2a.4\]]las/_sgrib pa kun las nges par grol/_/mkha' ltar mnyam pa nyid la gnas/_/zhes 'byung ngo /_/rjod byed tshig gi sgo nas 'phags pa ni thabs kyi theg pa 'di nyid yin te/_thabs mang ba dang thabs mkhas pa dang /_thabs sla ba dang /_
[\[2a.5\]]thabs myur ba dang bzhis 'phags te/_de yang /_don gcig na yang bye brag ni/_/thabs mang ba dang mkhas pa dang /_/de bzhin sla dang myur ba yis/_/sngags kyi bstan pa khyad par 'phags/_/zhes 'byung ngo /_/de la thabs mang ba ni
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]gdul bya rnams kyi blo la ji ltar mos pa las ma bzlog par grol ba'i thabs mtha' yas par ston pa'o/_/de yang /_nges 'byung kun gyi lam la gnas/_/zhes so/_/nyon mongs ma spangs kyang grol ba'i thabs shes pas thabs mkhas pa'o/_/de yang /_mkhas pa chen po thabs che ba/_/zhes pa'o/_/_
[\[2b.2\]]sgo gsum dka' thub kyis ma gzir bar 'dod pa'i longs spyod la gnas bzhin du grol ba'i thabs ston pas thabs sla ba'o/_/de yang /_longs spyod rdzogs sku kun gyi rgyal/_/zhes so/_/thabs kyi theg pa'i rigs can gyis thams cad gnyis med du rtogs pas/_tshe 'di nyid la byang chub 'grub pas
[\[2b.3\]]thabs myur ba'o/_/de la 'jam dpal ni dbye na rnam pa lnga ste/_rang bzhin rgyu'i 'jam dpal dang /_/sgom pa lam gyi 'jam dpal dang /_/mthar thug 'bras bu'i 'jam dpal dang /_/gdul bya las dag pa la snang ba'i 'jam dpal dang /_rnam pa'i bdag nyid du snang ba'i 'jam dpal lo/_/de la rang
[\[2b.4\]]bzhin rgyu'i 'jam dpal ni 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad la chos nyid de bzhin nyid kyis khyab pa ste/_'di nyid las/_mi 'gyur kun 'gro khyab pa po/_/phra zhing zag med sa bon bral/_/zhes 'byung ngo /_/de la mtshan ma'i rnam par rtog pa'i zug rngu bral ba dang /_rtogs na kun gyi dpal du gyur pas de skad ces
[\[2b.5\]]bya'o/_/sgom pa lam gyi 'jam dpal ni bskyed rim dang rdzogs rim la sogs te/_lam gyi chos su gyur pa rnams yin te/_'di nyid las/_nges 'byung kun gyi lam la gnas/_/zhes 'byung ngo /_/de nyid kyi gnas skabs nas rtogs pa'i zug rngu rnams ni spangs la/_shas shig ni spong ba la zhugs pas
[\[2b.6\]]'jam la/_de las bdag dang gzhan gyi don 'byung bas dpal lo/_/mthar thug 'bras bu'i 'jam dpal ni sku gsum ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid la bya ste/_'di nyid las/_/mchog gi dang po sku gsum 'chang /_/zhes 'byung ngo /_/de la sku gsum ni thun mong gi dbang du byas na/_chos sku skye med nam mkha' lta bu
[\[2b.7\]]la longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku rnam par snang mdzad sprin lta bu 'byung ba de las sprul sku shAkya thub pa char lta bus 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'o/_/khyad par gyi dbang du byas na/_rig pa rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku/_rig pa sna tshogs su 'char ba sprul pa'i sku/_ji ltar snang
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]yang don skye mad las ma 'das pa chos kyi sku'o/_/de la ye shes lnga ni chos nyid skye 'gag med pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes te/_de nyid gsal la rtog pa med pa me long lta bu'i ye shes/_de gnyis su dbyer med cing blang dor med pas mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes/_/chos spyi dang
[\[3a.2\]]rang gi mtshan nyid ma 'dres par gsal ba ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes/_bdag dang gzhan gyi don rtsol ba med par grub pas ni bya ba grub pa'i ye shes so/_/de yang 'di nyid las/_khyab bdag ye shes lnga yi bdag_/ces 'byung ngo /_/gdul bya las dag pa la snang ba'i 'jam dpal ni rnal
[\[3a.3\]]'byor pa'i ting nge 'dzin goms pa'i mthus lha'i sku'i zhal mthong ba'o/_/rnam pa'i bdag nyid du snang ba'i 'jam dpal ni sku'i gzugs brnyan du gyur pa ras bal la ri mo bris pa dang /_zangs lcags la 'bur du btod pa de rnams so/_/gyi zhes pa ni 'brel pa'i yi ge ste/_ji skad du
[\[3a.4\]]smos pa'i yon tan rnams dang /_yon tan can rje btsun 'jam dpal du 'brel par ston te/_brgya byin gyi ba phra mo zhes bya ba lta bu'o/_/mtshan yang dag par brjod pa zhes pa/_mtshan ni 'og nas 'byung ba'i yon tan gyi chos rnams yin la/_yon tan de dag dang rje btsun nyid ldan la/_ldan pa kho na
[\[3a.5\]]ltar brjod pa'o/_/tshul ji ltar brjod na gnyis te/_zab pa don gyi sgo nas brjod pa dang /_rgya che ba tshig gi sgo nas brjod pa'o/_/don gyi sgo nas brjod pa ni don gnyis su med pa'i ye shes su gsal ba'o/_/tshig gi sgo nas brjod pa la gsum ste/_mtshan nyid gnyis su med pa'i tshul du brjod
[\[3a.6\]]pa dang /_gsang sngags kyi tshul du brjod pa dang /_yon tan gyi tshul du brjod pa'o/_/de la mtshan nyid gnyis su med pa'i tshul du brjod pa ni rang gi sems kyi mtshan nyid gnyis su med pa'i ye shes su ngo shes par byas la mtshan brjod par bya ste/_brjod pa'i sgra de dag byung yang skye 'gag med pa'i ngang las byung
[\[3a.7\]]la/_thim yang de nyid du thim ste/_mdor na chos kyi rang sgrar shes par bya'o/_/'di nyid las/_gnyis med gnyis su med par ston/_/yang dag mtha' la rnam par gnas/_/zhes 'byung ngo /_/mtshan sngags kyi tshul du brjod pa ni bdag nyid rje btsun 'jam dpal du bsgoms te mtshan brjod pas thugs
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]ka'i muM las 'od zer 'phros pas 'phags pa mchod pa dang /_sems can gyi don byas slar rang gi thugs kar thim/_yang snga ma ltar spro zhing bsdus te/_mtshan klag pa ma thon gyi bar du ci rigs su bya ba'o/_/de yang 'di nyid las/_gsang sngags tshul chen bdag nyid can/_/zhes 'byung ngo /_/mtshan yon
[\[3b.2\]]tan gyi tshul du brjod pa ni rje btsun 'jam dpal nyid la 'khor sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dpag tu med pas bskor ba/_mdun gyi nam mkha' la spyan drangs la mtshan brjod par bya ste/_'di yang khyod kyi yon tan yin zhes dmigs pa'o/_/de yang 'di nyid las/_
[\[3b.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan mtsho/_/zhes 'byung ngo /_/de dag kyang bsdun don zab pa dang /_tshig rgya che ba gnyis te/_'di nyid las/_zab cing rgya che'i sgra sgrogs pa/_/zhes 'byung ngo /_/da ni bar chad nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir phyag btsal ba bstan pa ni/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal
[\[3b.4\]]lo zhes smos te/_phyag na rdo rjes shAkya thub pa la zhus nas/_glegs bam du sdud pa'i dus su/_slad du yi dam lha la phyag 'tshal ba yin te/_'o na phyag na rdo rje la yang bar chad 'byung ngam zhe na/_ma yin te/_rjes 'jug gi don du dgongs pa'o/_/de yang 'jam dpal ni gong du bshad zin to/_/_
[\[3b.5\]]sku dus gsum du bgres rgud mi mnga' bas gzhon nu ste/_rtag tu da ltar 'byung ba lta bu'i tshul du bzhugs pa'o/_/la ni dkar ba'i yi ge ste 'jam dpal nyid la'o/_/phyag 'tshal lo zhes pa/_zab pa don rtogs pa'i phyag dang /_rgya che lus ngag yid gsum gus pa'i tshul gyis phyag btsal ba'o/_/_
[\[3b.6\]]de la dbang po 'bring gi don du dbu zhabs kyi dbye ba bstan pa ni/_bshad pa'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brangs nas le'u bcu bzhir ston pa las dang por zhus pa'i le'u bstan pa'i phyir/_/de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang /_/zhes pa la sogs pa smos te/_de nas zhes bya ba ni mtshams sbyor ba'i tshig
[\[3b.7\]]yin te gong du rtsa ba'i rgyud le'u khri drug stong pa bshad pa'i rjes su mtshan yang dag par brjod pa man ngag gi snying po glur blangs pa'i le'u 'di zhus zhes pa'o/_/dpal ni rtogs pa bdag gi dpal/_/thugs rje gzhan gyi dpal gnyis dang /_/phyag na rdo rje nyid ldan pa'o/_/rdo rje 'chang ba ni/_/nad
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]na zab pa don gyi rdo rje ye shes lnga dbyer mi phyed par 'chang ngo /_/de yang /_mi phyed rdo rje zhes brjod de/_/sems dpa' srid gsum gcig pu'o/_/zhes 'byung ngo /_/don de lta bu dang ldan pa'i rtags su rgya che ba lcags kyi rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsnams pa'o/_/des mdzad pa'i phrin las ci
[\[4a.2\]]mdzad ce na/_gdul dka' 'dul ba rnams kyi mchog_/dpa' bo 'jig rten gsum las rgyal/_/zhes smos te/_tshangs pa dang khyab 'jug la sogs te/_gdul dka' ba rnams 'dul ba la/_sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus nas ri rab kyi rtse mor phyag na rdo rje la dbang bskur bas mchog ces bya'o/_/_
[\[4a.3\]]rang 'jigs pa dang bral zhing gzhan gyi dpung 'joms pas dpa' la/_sa 'og gi bdag po ma hA de ba dang /_sa stengs kyi bdag po khyab 'jug_/sa bla'i bdag po tshangs pa dang gsum ni phyi rol pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi lha gsum yin la/_de gsum btul bas 'jig rten gsum las
[\[4a.4\]]rgyal ba'o/_/de yang nang du nyon mongs pa gsum btul ba'i rtags so/_/de'i rigs dang rtags gang zhe na/_rdo rje dbang phyug gsang ba'i rgyal/_/zhes smos te/_rdo rje'i rigs yin pa dang /_gsang sngags kyi sdud pa po rdo rje theg pa'i mnga' bdag tu gyur pas kyang rdo rje dbang phyug go/_/gsang ba'i
[\[4a.5\]]dam tshig dang ldan zhing /_nang gi nyon mongs pa dang gdug pa can rnams las rgyal bas rgyal zhes bya'o/_/de'i zhal ras ci 'dra zhe na/_pad+ma dkar po rgyas 'dra'i spyan/_/pad+ma rgyas pa'i zhal mnga' ba/_/zhes smos te/_pad+ma 'dam nas skyes kyang 'dam gyi skyon gyis ma gos pa dang 'dra bar/_
[\[4a.6\]]phyag na rdo rje nyid shin tu khro khro 'dra yang nang na nyon mongs pa med pas dkar ba'o/_/spyan kun du zlum pas rgyas 'dra'i spyan no/_/de'i phyag mtshan ci 'dra zhe na/_/rang gi lag gi rdo rje mchog_/yang dang yang du gsor byed pa/_/zhes smos te/_lag gi rdo rje de don gyi rtags su byung bas mchog go/_/_
[\[4a.7\]]yang dang yang du gsor byed pa ni/_bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi 'khor lo yang nas yang du skor cig par zhu ba 'bul ba'i brda yang yin/_thugs rje rgyun mi chad pas 'gro ba 'dren pa'i brda yang yin/_gdug pa can rgyun mi chad par 'dul ba'i brda yang yin/_nang na ye shes rgyun mi chad par mnga'
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]ba'i brda yang yin/_/de yi grogs gang dang lhan cig tu zhus she na/_'khor lag na rdo rje khro tshogs lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu zhus pa'i phyir/_/khro gnyer rim par ldan la sogs/_/lag na rdo rje mtha' yas pa/_/zhes smos te/_khro gnyer ni mche ba gtsigs pa dang /_spyan bzlog pa dang /_smin ma
[\[4b.2\]]bsdus pa dang /_'bri gu ta gyen du 'greng ba la sogs pa'o/_/khro tshogs de dag la yang yon tan dang mthu mtha' yas pa dag dang ldan pa'o/_/de dag gis phrin las ci mdzad ce na/_/dpa' bo gdul dka' 'dul ba po/_/zhes smos te/_gong du bshad pa dang 'dra'o/_/ci'i phyir gdul
[\[4b.3\]]dka' zhe na/_drag po btsan thabs kyis 'dul dgos pa'i phyir ro/_/de'i nyams ci 'dra zhe na/_'jigs su rung dang dpa' byed can/_/zhes smos te/_khro bo'i cha byad dang ldan pa'o/_/de dag gi phyag mtshan ci zhe na/_/rdo rje rtse mo rab 'phro ba/_/rang gi lag gis gsor byed pa/_/zhes smos te/_rdo rje'i
[\[4b.4\]]rtse mo las rdo rje phra mo byung nas gdug pa can 'dul ba'o/_/de dag kyang gtso bo'i rjes mthun du sbyong ba'o/_/de dag gi bsam pa'i khyad par ci zhe na/_/snying rje che dang shes rab dang /_/thabs kyis 'gro don byed pa'i mchog_/ces pa la sogs pa smos te/_'gro ba rnams la snying rje chen po dang ldan
[\[4b.5\]]pa ni rgya che ba'o/_/shes rab kyi chos rnam par 'byed pa ni zab pa'o/_/thabs de lta bus gzhan don byed pas na mchog go/_/yon tan gyi khyad par ji lta bus she na/_/dga' mgu rangs pa'i bsam pa can/_/zhes pa 'gro ba'i don byed pa la dga'/_/ston pa mthong ba na mgu/_chos bshad
[\[4b.6\]]pas rjes su yi rang ba'i bsam pa yod pa'o/_/gzugs ci dang ldan pas sangs rgyas kyi phrin las byed ce na/_/khro bo'i lus kyi gzugs ldan pa/_/sangs rgyas phrin las byed pa'i mgon/_/lus btud rnams dang lhan cig tu/_/zhes smos te/_rgyan dang rang bzhin khro bor gnas
[\[4b.7\]]shing mdzad pa bcu gnyis sam phrin las rnam pa bzhi'i sgo nas 'gro ba'i don mdzad la/_khro bo de rnams kyis kyang bag med du ma yin te/_shin tu gus pa'i tshul gyis lus btud nas zhus pa'o/_/tshul lam thabs ji ltar zhus she na/_de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das/_/rdzogs
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal nas/_/thal mo sbyar bar byas nas ni/_/spyan sngar 'dug ste 'di skad gsol/_/zhes smos te/_de bzhin nyid du gshegs pa dang /_/'gro ba'i don la gshegs shing bdud bzhi bcom/_legs pa'i yon tan drug dang ldan pa che ba'i yon tan
[\[5a.2\]]thams cad rdzogs pa/_ma rig pa'i sgrib pa sangs rgyas shing ye shes rgyas pa ste/_de yang ma rig gnyid ni sangs phyir dang /_/shes bya la yang blo rgyas phyir/_/sangs rgyas pad+mo ltar sangs rgyas/_/zhes pa lta bu'o/_/de dag gis thal mo sbyar ba'i bar du rdo rje bcug nas/_mdun du tsog tsog por
[\[5a.3\]]'dug nas zhus pa'o/_/dgos ched ci'i don du zhus she na/_khyab bdag bdag la sman pa dang /_/bdag don bdag la thugs brtse'i phyir/_/sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i mngon rdzogs pa'i/_/byang chub ci nas bdag thob mdzod/_/ces smos te/_brtan g.yo kun la khyab pas na khyab bdag ces ston
[\[5a.4\]]pa la bos nas/_'khor bdag cag rnams la sman pa dang /_thugs brtse bar mdzad pas thabs dang shes rab khyad par can zung du 'brel pas sgyu 'phrul dra ba ste/_de'i sgo nas mngon par rdzogs par byang chub bdag gis thob par mdzod cig pa ste/_rang don gzhan don dang 'brel pa'o/_/'o na
[\[5a.5\]]bdag gi don zhus pa de yin na/_gzhan gyi don du zhus pa gang yin zhe na/_nyon mongs pas ni sems dkrugs shing /_/mi shes 'dam du bying ba yi/_/sems can kun la sman pa dang /_/bla med 'bras bu thob bya'i phyir/_/zhes smos te/_zhe sdang la sogs pa nyon mongs pas byang chub sems chu
[\[5a.6\]]rnyogs pa lta bur dkrugs shing /_de kho na nyid mi shes te/_glang po che 'dam du chud pa ltar sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtshor chud pa'i sems can kun la/_de las bzlog nas tshe 'dir sman par bya ba dang /_tshe phyi ma la bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir yang bshad du gsol zhes bya
[\[5a.7\]]ba'o/_/ston pa gang la zhus she na/_rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/_/'gro ba'i bla ma ston pa po/_/zhes smos te/_rang dang gzhan gyi don thams cad rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus zhes pa'o/_/des 'gro ba rnams la chos ston par mdzad pa'o/_/ston
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]pa des don mi mkhyen pa mi srid dam zhe na/_dam tshig chen po de nyid mkhyen/_/zhes so/_/don rtogs pa las mi 'da' bas dam tshig chen po ste/_de nyid ji lta ba mkhyen pa'o/_/des gdul bya'i dbang po dang bsam pa mkhyen zhe na/_dbang po bsam pa mkhyen mchog gis/_/zhes smos te/_dbang
[\[5b.2\]]po'i bye brag gang la gang mos mkhyen pa'o/_/'o na chos gang zhu zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes sku/_/gtsug tor chen po'i tshig gi bdag_/ye shes sku ste rang byung ba/_/'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' yi/_/ming ni yang dag brjod pa'i mchog_/ces smos te/_bcom ldan
[\[5b.3\]]'das kyi ye shes sku ni/_me long ltar thams cad la gsal zhing 'char bas me long lta bu'i ye shes so/_/gtsug tor chen po ni chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kun gyi spyi bo'i gtsug tu bkur ba'i 'os yin pas mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so/_/tshig gi bdag po ni chos spyi dang rang gi mtshan
[\[5b.4\]]nyid ma 'dres par mkhyen pa'i sgo nas chos kyi tshig gsungs pa ste/_so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so/_/ye shes sku ni 'gro ba'i bya ba grub par byed pa'i sku ste/_de yang ye shes las grub pa'i sku yin pas bya ba grub pa'i ye shes so/_/rang 'byung ba ni skye ba med pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so/_/_
[\[5b.5\]]'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' ni/_rtsa ba byang chub kyi sems te/_ye shes chen pos mnyam pa nyid la sems la thugs rjes 'gro ba'i don la sems pa'o/_/de'i rtags gzugs skur byung ba la yang de skad ces bya'o/_/tshig dang don gyi sgo nas de'i ming yang dag par
[\[5b.6\]]brjod pa ni gzhan pas don che bas na mchog go/_/mdor na ye shes lnga byang chub sems dang drug ro gcig pa'i chos gcig zhus pa'o/_/'o na ming las don ma zhus sam zhe na/_/don zab don ni rgya che zhing /_/don chen mtshungs med rab zhi ba/_/thog ma bar dang mthar dge ba/_/_
[\[5b.7\]]zhes smos te/_ci'i phyir na don zab ce na/_don chen po gsang sngags kyi don chos mnyam pa nyid yin pas kyang zab/_chos gang dang yang mtshungs pa med pas kyang zab/_spros pa'i mtshan ma rab tu zhi bas kyang zab/_dge ba gsum gyi rgya dang ldan pas kyang zab/_/dus gsum gyi
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pas kyang zab/_rdo rje theg pa'i glu yin pas kyang zab/_de ltar brjod bya zab pas rjod byed kyang zab po/_/rgya che ba ni rnam sprul sna tshogs su snang ba'o/_/gang dang yang mi mnyam pas mtshungs pa med pa'o/_/spros pa'i mtha' thams cad rab tu zhi ba/_
[\[6a.2\]]thog mar dge ba thos pa'i shes rab/_bar du dge ba bsam pa'i shes rab/_tha mar dge ba bsgom pa'i shes rab po/_/ci'i phyir zhe na/_nyon mongs pa rtsad nas 'byin pas dge ba'o/_/de sus gsungs she na/_'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs/_/ma 'ongs rnams kyang gsung
[\[6a.3\]]'gyur la/_/da ltar byung ba rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/yang dang yang du gsungs pa gang /_/zhes smos te/_rgyal ba shAkya thub pas ri bya rkang can du phyag na rdo rje la 'di gsungs pa'i dus su/_de'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams pad+mo can zhes bya ba ni/_de bzhin gshegs
[\[6a.4\]]pa pad+mo mchog ces bya bas kyang 'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'di gsungs so/_/de bzhin du phyogs lnga por yang gsungs so/_/chos nyid kyi mkha' rnam par dag pas kyang sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang gis 'khor gyi de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di gsungs so/_/dpal rnam par snang
[\[6a.5\]]mdzad kyis kyang 'og min du 'khor byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'di gsungs so/_/ri rab kyi rtser sprul sku 'khor los sgyur ba lta bus kyang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la 'di gsungs so/_/dga' ldan gyi gnas su yang lha rnams la yang rgyal ba byams pas 'di gsungs so/_/_
