[\[10b.3\]]mongs pa ji ltar spang zhe na/_mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che/_/sems can thams cad dga' bar byed/_/ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te/_de mchod pa ni lha mnyes par byed pa'i phyir na mchod pa ste/_'dir nyon mongs pa ma spangs par ye shes su grub pa dgos pa mthun te rang gis mchod
[\[10b.4\]]pa'o/_/de nas kun la sbyar ro/_/chen po'i sgra ni dper na dug sel ba'i sngags la dug sngags zer ba ltar mi mthun pa'i phyogs 'joms pas chen po'o/_/'dod chags ni nyon mongs mnyam pa nyid la dang gis chags pa'o/_/des log pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar byed cing zag med
[\[10b.5\]]kyi dga' ba skyed par byed pa'o/_/mchod pa chen po zhe sdang che/_/nyon mongs kun gyi dgra che ba/_/zhes pa rnam par rtog pa 'joms pa'i zhe sdang mnga' la/_zhe sdang rang kha ma 'joms pas dgra che ba'o/_/mchod pa chen po gti mug che/_/gti mug blo ste gti mug sel/_/zhes pa
[\[10b.6\]]chos tha dad du byed pa med pa'i don gyi gti mug dang ldan pas des gti mug rang kha ma sel ba'o/_/mchod pa chen po khro ba che/_/khro ba chen po dgra che ba/_/zhes smos te/_nyon mongs pa skyer mi ster bas khro ba che la/_des khong khro rang kha ma 'joms pas dgra che ba'o/_/mchod pa
[\[10b.7\]]chen po chags pa che/_/chags pa thams cad sel bar byed/_/ces pa don zag med kyi bde ba la chags la/_ser sna'i chags zhen rang kha ma sel bar byed do/_/de la gong ma gong ma ni 'joms byed/_'og ma 'og ma ni gzhom bya'o/_/de dag la man ngag tu sbyar na rnam pa bzhi
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]ste/_nyon mongs pa de dag la zhen pa'i gdul bya la de dag ma spangs pa'i rjes su mthun pa'i spyod pa'i thabs kyis grol bar byed pas spyod mthun grol ba'i mchod pa'o/_/nyon mongs pa ye shes lngar gnas gyur pas gnas gyur ye shes kyi mchod pa'o/_/nyon
[\[11a.2\]]mongs pa lnga las grol bas rigs lnga'i sku phyag rgya chen po thob pas grol thar phyag rgya'i mchod pa'o/_/nyon mongs pa la brtags na ngo bo grub pa med de chos nyid du gnas pas rang bzhin dag pa'i mchod pa'o/_/'dod pa chen po bde ba che/_/dga' ba chen po mgu ba che/_/_
[\[11a.3\]]zhes pa sems can thar par 'dod pa'i blo yod pa la thar pa'i bde ba skyed par byed cing chos bstan pas dga' la/_/don rtogs pas mgu bar byed pa'o/_/gzugs che lus kyang che ba ste/_/kha dog che zhing lus bong che/_/ming yang che zhing rgya che ba/_/dkyil 'khor chen po
[\[11a.4\]]yangs pa yin/_/zhes snang la rang bzhin med pa'i gzugs dang /_gdol pa can gyi lus lta bur yang sprul te/_de yang ye shes las grub pa yin pas che zhes bya'o/_/nang na ye shes gsal ba'i rtags su sku gzi mdangs dang ldan pas kha dog che ba'o/_/gzhan zil
[\[11a.5\]]gyis gnon pas lus bong che ba'o/_/grags pa chen po yod pas ming che ba'o/_/bsod nams kyi tshogs rgyas pas rgya che ba'o/_/'dir zab pa dang rgya che ba gnyis su med pa dang /_no pi ka mtha' dag 'byung bas dkyil 'khor chen po'o/_/kun la khyab pa dang gang yang
[\[11a.6\]]bkag pa med pas yangs pa'o/_/de la ye shes kyi khyad par ni/_/shes rab mtshon chen 'chad ba ste/_/nyon mongs lcags kyu che ba'i mchog_/grags chen snyan grags chen po ste/_/snang ba chen po gsal ba che/_/zhes smos te/_shes rab kyi mtshon gyis nyon mongs pa 'joms
[\[11a.7\]]pa ste/_/dper na nyon mongs pa glang po che smyon pa la ye shes lcags kyus 'dul ba lta bu'o/_/de yang khams gsum du grags pa khyad par can yod pa dang /_nang du ye shes gsal ba'i rtags su phyir 'od zer gsal bas bskor ba'o/_/de la sprul pa'i tshul ji ltar 'byung zhe
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]na/_/mkhas pa sgyu 'phrul chen po 'chang /_/sgyu 'phrul chen po don grub pa/_/sgyu 'phrul chen po dga' bas dga'/_/sgyu 'phrul chen po mig 'phrul can/_/zhes smos te/_'gro ba la tshogs gnyis rdzogs par byed pa'i thabs la mkhas pa ste/_sgyu ma lta bu'i sprul pas 'gro ba'i don
[\[11b.2\]]mdzad pa'i thabs kyis gang 'dod pa'i don 'grub par byed pa ste/_de yang /_sems ni sgyu ma'i rnam pa ste/_/byang chub kyang ni sgyu ma 'dra/_/dper na sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'gas/_/gyo mo la ni sngags bzlas te/_/sbyor ba goms pas bsnun na ni/_/rkang bzhi pa la sogs pa'i gzugs/_/_
[\[11b.3\]]zhen pa'i sems la snang bar 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/thugs rjes 'gro ba'i don la dga' ba dang /_shes rab kyis gnyis med kyi don la dga' ba'o/_/med pa 'phrul zhing yod pa bsgyur ba dang 'dra ste/_don zab mo ma rtogs pa rnams la mig 'phrul bstan nas dngos
[\[11b.4\]]'dzin zlog par byed do/_/des thun mong gi lam ji lta bu ston zhe na/_/sbyin bdag chen po gtso bo ste/_/tshul khrims chen po 'chang ba'i mchog_/bzod chen 'chang ba brtan pa po/_/brtson 'grus chen po brtul ba yin/_/bsam gtan chen po'i ting 'dzin gnas/_/shes rab
[\[11b.5\]]chen po lus 'chang ba/_/stobs po che la thabs che ba/_/smon lam ye shes rgya mtsho ste/_/zhes smos te/_'khor gsum yongs su dag pa gtong bas sbyin pa'i gtso bo'o/_/nyes byas mi 'byung bas tshul khrims chen po'o/_/mtshan mas mi 'khrugs pas bzod pa brtan
[\[11b.6\]]pa'o/_/rtogs pas ma gos pas brtson 'grus brtul ba'o/_/g.yeng ba'i sgra med pas bsam gtan chen po'o/_/gnyis med rtogs pas shes rab chen po'o/_/bdud kyi dpung 'joms pas stobs che ba'o/_/bdag dang gzhan grol bar byed pa'i thabs sna tshogs mnga'
[\[11b.7\]]bas thabs che bar 'gyur ro/_/bdag dang gzhan grol bar byed pa'i smon lam mnga' bas dang /_ji lta ba dang ji snyed pa mkhyen pa'i ye shes mnga' ba ste/_rgya che ba dang /_snang la zhen pa med pa rgya mtsho dang 'dra'o/_/de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa bcu dang rje btsun ldan la/_gzhan la
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]yang ston par mdzad do/_/byams chen rang bzhin dpag tu med/_/snying rje chen po blo yi mchog_/ces pa 'gro ba la bu gcig pa'i ma bzhin du byams la/_de nyid lam zhen pas byams pa chen po'o/_/ris su che ba dang /_res 'jog med pas dpag tu med do/_/_
[\[12a.2\]]'gro ba la snying rje rgyun mi 'chad pas che ba'o/_/de nyid la'ang ma zhen pas blo'i mchog go/_/'o na tshad med pa bzhi yod pa la dga' ba dang btang snyoms ma smos pa ci yin zhe na/_de ni chos zlas dbye ba ste shugs la bstan to/_/thabs shes rab kyi khyad par ci zhe na/_shes rab chen po blo chen
[\[12a.3\]]ldan/_/mkhas pa chen po thabs che ba/_/zhes smos te/_chos rab tu rnam par phye nas gnyis med rtogs pa'i shes rab chen po mnga' ba ste/_des 'gro ba'i don byed pa'i blo gros dang ldan pa'i sgo nas thabs kyi bya ba la mkhas te/_gdul bya'i bsam pa dang sbyar nas gang la ji ltar 'dul
[\[12a.4\]]ba'i thabs sna tshogs ston pa'o/_/thabs dang shes rab ni khyab che ste/_lam dang 'bras bus bsdus pa yo la gnas so/_/'o na rdzu 'phrul gyi sgo ji lta bus don mdzad ce na/_rdzu 'phrul chen po'i stobs dang ldan/_/shugs chen mgyogs pa chen po ste/_/rdzu 'phrul chen po cher grags
[\[12a.5\]]pa/_/stobs chen pha rol gnon pa po/_/zhes smos te/_stod nas me 'bar ba dang /_smad nas chu 'brub pa dang /_gcig du mar byed pa dang /_du ma gcig tu byed pa dang /_stong gsum phyag rgyar shong ba dang /_phyag rgya stong gsum du sprul pa la sogs pa dang /_tshur mi brdzi ba dang /_gzhan
[\[12a.6\]]phar 'joms pas stobs so/_/'gro ba'i don byed pa la yid ltar mgyogs pa'i shugs dang ldan zhing /_nyan thos dang /_rang rgyal dang /_'jig rten pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams la cher grags so/_/ye shes kyi stobs kyis bdud bzhi zil gyis gnon pa ste che ba'o/_/_
[\[12a.7\]]de'i nus mthu dngos gang zhe na/_/srid pa'i ri bo chen po 'joms/_/mkhregs shing rdo rje chen po 'chang /_/drag po chen po drag shul che/_/'jigs chen 'jigs par byed pa po/_/zhes smos te/_yang nas yang du 'gro ba drug tu skye bas srid pa'o/_/de ri bo ltar gzhom dka'
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]bas/_gnyis med rtogs pas 'joms par byed pa'o/_/de'i mtshan nyid mi 'gyur bas mkhregs la/_stong pa nyid rdo rje ltar dbyer mi phyed pa'o/_/de yang /_/mi phyed mi chod mi shigs pas/_/stong pa nyid la rdo rjer bshad/_/ces pa lta bu'o/_/de yang don gyi sgo nas bag chags
[\[12b.2\]]thams cad 'joms pas drag po che la rtags kyi sgo nas gdug pa can thams cad 'dul bar byed pa'i drag po'i gzugs su sprul pa'o/_/des gang 'jigs par byed na/_khyab 'jug dang /_ma hA de ba la sogs pa 'jigs chen rnams rje btsun gyis 'jigs par byed pa'o/_/khyad
[\[12b.3\]]par gyi lam gyi tshul gang zhe na/_/mgon po rigs mchog chen po ste/_/bla ma gsang sngags che ba'i mchog_/theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas/_/theg pa chen po'i tshul gyi mchog_/ces smos te/_gdul bya'i mgon skyabs mdzad pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi lha'i rigs la mchog
[\[12b.4\]]tu gyur cing 'gro ba la dam pa'i chos nye bar ston pas bla ma/_thabs dang shes rab khyad par can ston pas gsang sngags che ba'i mchog go/_/de yang /_/don gcig na yang ma rmongs dang /_/thabs mang dka' ba med pa dang /_/dbang po rnon po'i dbang byas pas/_/sa dang pha
[\[12b.5\]]rol phyin pa'o/_/sngags kyi bstan pa khyad par 'phags/_/zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/de yang theg pa chen po ni shes rab dang snying rjes khyad par du byas pa'o/_/skal ba can de la gzud pa'i phyir/_/rang nyid kyang de la gnas pa'i tshul ston na/_/theg pa chen po 'di'i tshul pha
[\[12b.6\]]rol tu phyin pa las mchog tu gyur to/_/gang gis na 'khor 'das dbyer med du ston pa'o/_/da ni chos kyi dbyings kyi sgo nas 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i mtshan bstan pa'i phyir/_sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad che/_/thub pa chen po thub chen ldan/_/gsang sngags
[\[12b.7\]]tshul chen las byung ba/_/gsang sngags tshul chen bdag nyid can/_/zhes smos te/_sgrib pa sangs shing ye shes rgyas pas gdul bya la rnam pa sna tshogs su snang zhing /_gzhan don mdzad pas che'o/_/sku gsung thugs kyi mi dge ba'i las la bsrung mi dgos par thub la
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]de yang dus rtag tu mnyam pa la bzhag pas thub chen ldan no/_/bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mthu ston pa dang /_'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i srog bskul bas na sngags so/_/de nyid rtogs dka' ba dang /_gzhan la bstan pa ma yin pas/_gsang
[\[13a.2\]]ba'o/_/tshul ni lam mo/_/de las sangs rgyas 'byung ba ste/_de ni khyad par gyi lam mo/_/rje btsun nyid gsang sngags kyi ngo bo nyid du bzhugs pas na bdag nyid can no/_/thun mong gi lam gang zhe na/_pha rol phyin bcu thob pa ste/_/pha rol phyin pa bcu la gnas/_/pha rol phyin bcu
[\[13a.3\]]dag pa ste/_/pha rol phyin pa bcu yi tshul/_/zhes smos te/_pha rol tu phyin pa bcu la dbang thob cing /_gzhan de la gzud pa'i phyir rang yang de la gnas pa'i tshul ston pa dang /_de rnams lam zhen pa dang /_de dag gi gzhung tshul la mkhas pa'o/_/mgon po sa bcu'i dbang phyug ste/_/_
[\[13a.4\]]sa bcu la ni gnas pa po/_/zhes pas ni yon tan 'phel ba'i rten byed pas shes rab dang ting nge 'dzin las zhes bya ste/_de yang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sems thob pas sa dang po rab tu dga' ba'o/_/tshul khrims 'chal ba'i dri ma dang bral bas gnyis pa dri ma med pa'o/_/_
[\[13a.5\]]mchog tu gsal ba'i shes rab thob pas gsum pa 'od byed pa'o/_/byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos kyi 'od 'phro bas bzhi pa 'od 'phro ba'o/_/bsam gtan dang 'gro don mdzad pa gnyis 'joms pas rang gi rgyud sbyang bar dka' bar mdzad pas lnga pa sbyang dka' ba'o/_/_
[\[13a.6\]]mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du gyur pas drug pa mngon du gyur pa'o/_/mtshan ma las ring du song bas na bdun pa ring du song ba'o/_/ting nge 'dzin de la mtshan ma gang gis kyang mi g.yo bar gnas pas brgyad pa mi g.yo ba'o/_/gdul bya rnams la chos ston pa'i blo gros
[\[13a.7\]]chen po dang ldan pas dgu pa legs pa'i blo gros so/_/chos kyi char gyis gdul bya'i chos kyi lo tog smin par byed pa'i yon tan gyi sprin chen po dang ldan pas bcu pa chos kyi sprin gyi sa zhes bya'o/_/sa bcu la dbang bsgyur zhing gzhan la 'chad pa dang /_gzhan de la gzud par bya
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]ba'i phyir/_de la gnas pa'i tshul ston pa'o/_/der yang ma zad de che ba'i yon tan du mar snang ba'i phyir/_/shes bcu rnam dag bdag nyid can/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te/_shes pa bcu ni chos shes pa dang /_rjes su 'gro ba shes pa dang /_pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang /_
[\[13b.2\]]kun rdzob shes pa dang /_sdug bsngal shes pa dang /_kun 'byung shes pa dang /_'gog pa shes pa dang /_lam shes pa dang /_zad pa shes pa dang /_mi skye ba shes pa dang /_shes pa bcu po de rang bzhin med par shes pas rnam dag go/_/de rnams gzhan la ston pas shes bcu rnam dag
[\[13b.3\]]'chang ba po zhes bya'o/_/rnam pa bcu po don bcu'i don/_/zhes pa rnam pa bcu ni 'khor ba'i chos phung po lnga dang /_nyon mongs pa lnga ste bcu'o/_/'khor ba'i chos thams cad bsdus na der 'dus so/_/de dag rnam par dag pas don bcu ste/_rigs lnga ye shes lnga ste bcu'o/_/de bcu
[\[13b.4\]]ni don du gnyer bar bya ba'i 'os yin pas don zhes bya'o/_/thub dbang stobs bcu khyab pa'i bdag_/ces pa thub pa ni rgyal ba rnams so/_/de rnams kyi gtso bor gyur pas thub dbang ngo /_/stobs bcu ni gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /_las dang 'bras bu mkhyen
[\[13b.5\]]pa'i stobs dang /_khams rnams ji lta ba bzhin du mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /_lam sna tshogs pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /_pha rol gyi mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /_dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba
[\[13b.6\]]mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /_sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /_skye ba dang 'chi 'pho mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /_zag bcas dang zag med mkhyen pa'i stobs so/_/de yang thugs rje chen pos kun la khyab pa'i bdag nyid du zhugs pa'o/_/thugs rjes khyab
[\[13b.7\]]pa tsam ma yin te/_gdul bya ma lus pa'i don ji ltar 'tsham par mdzad pas/_/kun gyi don ni ma lus byed/_/ces pa smos pa yin no/_/rnam bcu dbang ldan che ba po/_/zhes pa rje btsun nyid dbang bcu'i yon tan dang ldan te/_tshe la dbang ba dang /_sems dang /_yo byad
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]dang /_las dang /_skye ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul dang /_mos pa dang /_smon lam dang /_ye shes dang /_chos la dbang ba'o/_/de ltar na mtshan ma can gyi skyon du mi 'gyur ram zhe na/_thog ma med pa spros med bdag_/de bzhin nyid dag dag pa'i bdag_/ces smos te/_
[\[14a.2\]]chos nyid la thog mtha' med pa la brtags pas mtha' thams cad dang bral bas spros pa med pa'o/_/'gyur ba med pas de bzhin nyid do/_/gzung 'dzin gyi dri ma med pas dag pa'i bdag go/_/de ltar na gzhan gyi don la ji ltar 'dug ce na/_/bden par smra zhing tshig mi 'gyur/_/_
[\[14a.3\]]ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed/_/gnyis med gnyis su med par ston/_/gzhan mi slu bar don dang mthun par smra bas bden par smra la/_gzhan don byed par dam bcas pa kho na bzhin du mdzad pas tshig mi 'gyur ba'o/_/chos thams cad sgyu ma'am rmi lam lta bu yin no zhes smra
[\[14a.4\]]ba kho na bzhin du rang yang spyod par byed do/_/rjes su mthun pas gzhan mos pa bskyed pa'i phyir ro/_/de mi mthun pa'i phyogs zil gyis gnon par bstan pa ni/_/yang dag mtha' la rnam par gnas/_/bdag med seng ge'i sgra dang ldan/_/mu stegs ri dgas ngan 'jigs byed/_/_
[\[14a.5\]]kun du 'gro ba'i don yod stobs/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid ltar mgyogs/_/zhes smos te/_yang dag pa'i mtha' gnyis med la gnas nas/_bdag dang bdag gir mngon par zhen pa med pa'i chos kyi sgra 'jigs pa med par sgrogs par byed pa/_seng ge'i sgra lta bu lta ba
[\[14a.6\]]log pa bdag tu rtog cing /_nad pa la smod pa'i ri dwags lta bu ngan pa 'jigs shing skrag par byed cing 'gro ba kun gyi don skyes bu'i stobs ltar ji ltar yang snang nas mdzad do/_/de yang 'gro ba'i don la de ka bzhin du gshegs te/_myur bar mdzad pa'i dpe ni yid lta bu'o/_/_
[\[14a.7\]]de la sku'i yon tan ji ltar snang na/_rgyal ba rnam rgyal dgra las rgyal/_/'khor los sgyur ba stobs po che/_/tshogs kyi slob dpon tshogs kyi mchog_/tshogs rje tshogs bdag dbang dang ldan/_/mthu chen gces par 'dzin pa ste/_/tshul chen gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog_/ces te/_
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]yon tan gyi bgo skal gyis ma pham pas rgyal ba dang /_rnam par rtog pa las rgyal ba dang /_dgra bdud bzhi las rgyal ba ste/_'jig rten pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ltar sprul nas 'gro ba'i don mdzad pas kyang 'khor los sgyur ba'o/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
[\[14b.2\]]bas 'gro ba rnams kyi kha lo sgyur bas kyang 'khor los sgyur ba'o/_/dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo mdzad pas kyang 'khor los sgyur ba'o/_/gzhan gyi dpung 'joms pas kyang stobs che ba'o/_/de yang nyan thos kyi tshogs kyi slob dpon mdzad cing /_rang rgyal ba 'dren pas na tshogs
[\[14b.3\]]kyi mchog go/_/byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi rje bo mdzad cing /_de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs kyi bdag po mdzad/_de rnams la dbang bsgyur ba'i mthu dang ldan pa'o/_/der yang ma zad de gzung 'dzin 'joms pa'i mthu chen po mnga' bas shin tu gces pa'i chos ni gnyis med yin
[\[14b.4\]]pas de 'chang bas 'dzin pa'o/_/des na lam bgrod du med pas/_gzhan gyis bkri mi dgos pa ste/_des na gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'o/_/de la gsung gi yon tan ji lta bu 'byung zhe na/_/tshig rje tshig bdag smra mkhas pa/_/tshig la dbang ba tshig mtha' yas/_/tshig bden bden
[\[14b.5\]]par smra ba ste/_/bden pa bzhi ni ston pa po/_/zhes smos te/_'dis ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi bstan te/_tshig rje ni don so so yang dag par rig pa'o/_/tshig bdag ni nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa'o/_/smra ba mkhas pa ni chos so so yang dag par rig pa'o/_/tshig
[\[14b.6\]]la dbang ba ni spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa'o/_/sgra skad sna tshogs kyis don mdzad pas tshig mtha' yas so/_/mi slu ba'i chos gsungs pas tshig bden la/_de yang kun rdzob dang don dam pa gnyis su phye nas smra ba dang /_sdug bsngal dang /_kun 'byung dang /_'gog pa dang /_
[\[14b.7\]]lam ste/_de ltar bden pa bzhi phye nas kyang ston par mdzad do/_/nges par 'byung ba'i chos su ji ltar snang zhe na/_/phyir mi ldog pa phyir mi 'ong /_/'dren pa rang rgyal bse ru'i tshul/_/nges 'byung sna tshogs las 'byung ba/_/'byung ba chen po rgyu gcig po/_/dge slong dgra bcom zag
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]pa zad/_/'dod chags bral ba dbang po thul/_/bde ba rnyed pa 'jigs med thob/_/ces smos te/_spyir bzod pa thob nas ngan song du mi ldog_/sa dang po thob nas 'khor bar mi ldog_/sa brgyad pa non nas theg dman du mi ldog ste/_de phyin chad rdzogs
[\[15a.2\]]pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog ste/_'khor bar mi 'ong ngo /_/'gro ba'i don du sprul pa ni ma gtogs so/_/de la 'dren pa rang rgyal ni ne tsho ltar tshogs na spyod pa'o/_/bse ru ni bse ru ltar gcig pur gnas pa'o/_/rje btsun der yang sprul lo/_/der yang ma zad de theg pa sna tshogs kyi
[\[15a.3\]]sgo nas gang la gang gis 'dul ba dang /_khams gsum las nges par 'byung ba'i lan sna tshogs ston par mdzad cing /_'byung ba chen po lngar snang nas kyang don mdzad de/_de dag gi rgyu ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so/_/de yang dge ba lam du slong zhing /_nyon mongs pa'i dgra 'joms
[\[15a.4\]]pas srid par skye ba'i zag pa zad do/_/'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa dang bral bas spyod yul gyis mi gos te/_mig la sogs yul lnga la mi chags par shar bas/_'khor ba'i g.yang sas 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro/_/de 'chad pa po'i tshul ci 'dra zhe na/_/bsil bar gyur bas
[\[15a.5\]]rnyog pa med/_/rig pa dang ni rkang par ldan/_/bde gshegs 'jig rten rig pa'i mchog_/bdag gir mi 'dzin ngar mi 'dzin/_/bden pa gnyis kyi tshul la gnas/_/'khor ba'i pha rol mthar son pa/_/bya ba byas pa skam sar gnas/_/ye shes 'ba' zhig las 'byung ba/_/zhes
[\[15a.6\]]smos te/_bsil ba chu lta bu'i chos nyid kyis nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba sel zhing /_glo bur gyi rnam par rtog pa dri ma chu'i rnyog ma lta bu dang bral te/_mig dang 'dra ba'i lta ba rig pa dang /_rkang pa dang 'dra bar spyod pa zung 'brel du ldan pas 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dang bral bas bde bar gshegs
[\[15a.7\]]pa la sems can gyi las 'phro dang /_mos pa dang snod du rung mi rung dang /_'dul ba'i dus la bab ma bab mkhyen pas nyan thos dang /_rang rgyal las khyad par du 'phags pas 'jig rten rig pa'i mchog go/_/mngon sum du snang ba 'di sgyu ma lta bur mkhyen pas phyi yul la bdag gir mi
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]'dzin la/_nang sems la ngar mi 'dzin te/_rang don dang gzhan don gyi dbang gis bden pa gnyis kyi tshul la gnas par byed do/_/'o na 'khor bar mi 'gyur ram zhe na/_/'khor ba'i pha rol mthar son te/_/bya ba byas nas stobs dang ldan pas 'dam nas 'thon pa ltar 'khor ba'i 'dam
[\[15b.2\]]nas 'thon te byang chub kyi skam sa la gnas pa'o/_/de'i rgyu ni gnyis su med par rtogs pa'i ye shes 'ba' zhig la gzugs sku gnyis 'byung ba'o/_/des bstan pa'i chos gang zhe na/_/shes rab mtshon chen rnam 'joms pa/_/dam chos chos rgyal gsal bar ldan/_/'jig rten
[\[15b.3\]]snang bar byed pa'i mchog_/ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te/_shes rab mtshon lta bus nyon mongs pa 'joms pa'o/_/dam pa'i chos rgyal po lta bu thugs la gsal bar ldan pas 'jig rten pa la ye shes snang bar byed pa'o/_/don phra mo tsam ma yin te thar pa la sbyor ba'i mchog go/_/des
[\[15b.4\]]gzhan don 'byung ba'i tshul ni/_chos kyi dbang phyug chos kyi rgyal/_/legs pa'i lam ni ston pa po/_/don grub bsam pa grub pa ste/_/zhes smos te/_chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong la rje btsun nyid dbang sgyur bas chos kyi dbang phyug go/_/des gdul bya rnams nyon mongs pa las rgyal
[\[15b.5\]]bar byas nas phyin ci ma log par legs pa'i lam ji ltar 'tsham par bstan te/_sems can gyi don dang bsam pa grub par byed pa'o/_/'o na rje btsun nyid rtog bcas su mi 'gyur ram zhe na/_/kun du rtog pa thams cad spangs/_/rnam par mi rtog dbyings mi zad/_/chos dbyings dam pa
[\[15b.6\]]zad mi shes/_/zhes smos te/_gzhan don mdzad kyang rtog pa med de/_/yang dag pa'i ye shes dang log rtog 'gal ba'i phyir ro/_/rnam par mi rtog kyang dbyings las yon tan zad pa med par 'byung ste/_yon tan gyi 'byung khungs chos kyi dbyings la zad mi shes pa'o/_/de tshogs ji
[\[15b.7\]]ltar rdzogs she na/_/bsod nams ldan pa bsod nams tshogs/_/ye shes ye shes khyad par che/_/ye shes ldan pa yod med shes/_/tshogs gnyis tshogs ni bsags pa'o/_/zhes smos te/_rje btsun nyid ye nas bsod nams kyi tshogs dang ldan la/_gzhan de la gzhug pa'i
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]phyir nyid kyang tshogs sogs pa'i tshul ston pa'o/_/ye shes kyi tshogs dang yang ldan te/_de yang nyan thos dang rang rgyal ba'i ye shes las kyang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes khyad par che ste/_de las kyang khyad par du gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes
[\[16a.2\]]dang ldan pas/_yod pa zhes bya ba ji snyed pa dang /_med pa zhes bya ba ji lta ba shes pa ste/_de ltar tshogs gnyis rdzogs pas ni tshogs bsags pa las 'byung bar bstan pa'o/_/tshogs bsags pa las sangs rgyas kyi sku ji ltar 'byung zhe na/_/rtag pa kun rgyal rnal 'byor can/_/bsam
[\[16a.3\]]gtan bsam bya blo ldan mchog_/so sor rang rig spyod yul ba/_/mchog gi dang po sku gsum 'chang /_/zhes pa la sogs pa smros te/_don dam chos kyi sku mi 'gyur ba de rnam rtog gi sgra las rgyal zhing /_thabs dang shes rab zung du 'brel bas rnal 'byor te/_de yang 'di skad du/_
[\[16a.4\]]thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug pa/_/rnal 'byor zhes su brjod pa yin/_/zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/rnam par mi rtog pa'i snying po la rnam par rtog pa mi g.yo bas bsam gtan/_de sangs rgyas don du gnyer ba rnams kyis bsam par bya ba'i 'os yin pas bsam bya/_/gnyis
[\[16a.5\]]med rtogs pas blo dang ldan pa'i mchog go/_/de yang mkhyen tshad ni/_chos spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid ma 'dres par so sor rang gis rig pa'o/_/de la ma zhen pa ni mi g.yo ba'o/_/de lta bu ni sku thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa ste/_sku'i bye brag gzhan 'byung ba'i dngos po la de thob dgos pas
[\[16a.6\]]dang po/_/de'i yon tan gyi khyad par sku gsum du snang ba'o/_/de las sku dang ye shes kyi bye brag ji ltar 'byung zhe na/_/sangs rgyas sku lnga'i bdag nyid can//_khyab bdag ye shes lnga yi bdag_/sangs rgyas lnga bdag cod pan can/_/spyan lnga chags pa med pa 'chang /_/sangs rgyas
[\[16a.7\]]thams cad skyed pa po/_/sangs rgyas sras po dam pa'i mchog_/ces smos te/_sku lnga ni chos kyi sku dang /_longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang /_sprul pa'i sku dang /_rdo rje lta bu'i sku dang /_mngon par byang chub pa'i sku'o/_/khyab bdag ni chos kyi dbyings kyis snod bcud kun la khyab pa'o/_/_
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]ye shes lnga ni slad du bshad zin to/_/sangs rgyas lnga ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa lnga'o/_/ye shes lnga las sangs rgyas lngas brgyan pa cod pan can zhes bya'o/_/spyan lnga ni sha'i spyan dang /_lha'i spyan dang /_shes rab kyi spyan dang /_chos kyi spyan dang /_sangs rgyas kyi spyan no/_/de rnams
[\[16b.2\]]la thogs chags med pas mnga' ba'o/_/byang chub kyi sems de kho na nyid rtogs nas sangs rgyas thams cad skyed pa'i yum du 'gyur zhing /_sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi sras so/_/'o na nyan thos rnams sras dam pa min pa ci'i phyir zhe na/_dper na/_
[\[16b.3\]]'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la sras stong yod kyang /_mtshan dang ldan pa gcig sras kyi dam par 'dzin pa de bzhin du/_nyan thos dang rang rgyal shes rab dang snying rje chung bas sangs rgyas kyi rigs 'dzin cing mdzad pa sgrub mi nus pas sras kyi dam pa ma yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' ni
[\[16b.4\]]snying rje dang shes rab che bas sangs rgyas kyi rigs 'dzin cing mdzad pa sgrub pas sras po dam pa'o/_/gnas skabs su byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs su rje btsun nyid bzhugs nas 'gro ba'i don mdzad pas de skad ces bya'o/_/de'i mdzad pa ci zhe na/_shes pa srid 'byung skye gnas med/_/chos
[\[16b.5\]]las byung ba srid pa sel/_/gcig tu sra mkhregs rdo rje'i bdag_/skyes ma thag tu 'gro ba'i bdag_/ces smos te/_de kho na shes pas srid pa las 'byung ste/_'khor bar skye ba'i gnas med do/_/chos kyi sku rtogs pa las ye shes 'byung ste/_de srid pa'i rgyu las dang nyon mongs pa
[\[16b.6\]]sel lo/_/gang gis sel na ye shes drug ro gcig pa/_gnyen po med pa/_dbyer med pa des sel lo/_/dus nam sel na skyes ma thag tu'o/_/ye shes lnga'i tshul gyis gzhan gyis ma rig pa ji ltar sel na/_/nam mkha' las byung rang byung ba/_/shes rab ye shes me'o che/_/'od chen rnam
[\[16b.7\]]par snang bar byed/_/ye shes skar ma lam me ba/_/'gro ba'i mar me ye shes sgron/_/zhes smos te/_chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' dang 'dra ba las yon tan 'gag pa med pa 'byung bas chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so/_/de'i don shes rab dam pa rtogs te/_gsal la rtog pa med pa'i ye
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]shes kyi mes 'joms te/_me yis rtsi sbur bsreg pa lta bu ni me long lta bu'i ye shes so/_/chos thams cad mnyam par rtogs pa'i ye shes kyi 'od chen po 'bar bas gdul bya la che ba'i yon tan sna tshogs snang bar byed pas mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so/_/so sor rtog/_
[\[17a.2\]]pa'i ye shes sprin med pa'i nam mkha' la skar ma'i tshogs ma 'dres par gsal ba ltar chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid ma 'dres par rtogs pas so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so/_/bya ba grub pa'i ye shes mar me lta bus 'gro ba'i ma rig pa'i mun pa sel zhing /_'dod pa'i don yongs su rdzogs
[\[17a.3\]]par mdzad pas bya ba grub pa'i ye shes so/_/khyad par gsang sngags kyi sgo nas bstan pa'i phyir/_/gzi brjid chen po 'od gsal ba/_/sngags mchog mnga' bdag rig sngags rgyal/_/gsang sngags rgyal bo don chen byed/_/gtsug tor chen po rmad byung gtsug_/ces smos te/_
[\[17a.4\]]gzhan zil gyis gnon pa'i gzi brjid kyi phung po chen po mnga' zhing /_nang na ye shes lnga gsal ba'i rtags su phyi rol du 'od kha dog lnga gsal ba'o/_/sngags kyi mchog tu gyur pas gsang sngags rig sngags yin la de'i mnga' bdag go/_/rig sngags kyi rgyal po ni shes rab dang ye shes
[\[17a.5\]]yin la/_gsang sngags kyi rgyal po ni thabs dang shes rab khyad par can yin pas/_skal ba dang skal bar ldan pa la de gnyis kyi sgo nas don byed pa'o/_/de ni rmad du byung ba'i chos yin pas gtsug tor ltar kun gyi spyi gtsug tu bkur bar 'os pa'o/_/de tsam du ma zad de 'khrul ba sna tshogs su
[\[17a.6\]]'byung ba ni/_nam mkha'i bdag po sna tshogs ston/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi sku yi mchog_/'gro kun dga' ba'i mig dang ldan/_/sna tshogs gzugs can skyed pa po/_/zhes smos te/_zab pa rang gi don nam mkha' lta bu las rgya che ba gzhan gyi don sna tshogs ston pa'o/_/sku'i mchog tu
[\[17a.7\]]gyur pa ni drug po ro gcig pa'o/_/des 'gro ba'i don la gzigs te ji ltar dga' ba'i gzugs sna tshogs su sprul nas don mdzad pa'o/_/mdor na byang chub kyi sems sna tshogs su sprul nas don mdzad pa'o/_/mdor na byang chub kyi sems gzugs sna tshogs su shar bar ston to/_/_
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]de nyid don dang ldan pas gzhan gyis bkur ba'i 'os su gyur ba'i phyir/_/drang srong che dgus mchod cing brjod/_/rigs gsum 'chang ba gsang sngags 'chang /_/dam tshig chen po gsang sngags 'dzin/_/gtso bo dkon mchog gsum 'dzin pa/_/zhes pa ste/_drang srong ni spyir rig pa
[\[17b.2\]]sgrub pa rnams la bya/_drang srong chen po ni bcom ldan 'das te rang yang drang po'i lam du zhugs pa la/_gzhan yang drang po'i lam du song ba'i phyir ro/_/des kyang rje btsun nyid la mchod pa dang /_yon tan brjod cing bstod pa'i gnas su gyur pa'o/_/de ci 'chad na/_sku de bzhin gshegs
[\[17b.3\]]pa'i rigs dang /_gsung pad+ma'i rigs dang /_thugs rdo rje'i rigs gsum 'chang zhing thabs dang shes rab khyad par can 'chang bas na/_gsang sngags 'chang ba ste/_don las mi 'da' bas na/_dam tshig chen po gsang sngags kyi sgo nas gdul bya rjes su 'dzin te/_rtsa ba byang chub kyi
[\[17b.4\]]sems te chos thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pas gtso bo'o/_/des dkon mchog gsum gyi tshul 'dzin cing /_gzhan yang 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad do/_/de yang rgya che ba'i dkon mchog ni spyi dang mthun/_zab pa'i dbang du byas nas byang chub kyi sems gnyis su med pas sangs rgyas
[\[17b.5\]]dkon mchog_/de'i don rtogs pa ni chos dkon mchog go/_/rjes su sgrub pa ni dge 'dun dkon mchog go/_/chos kyi sgo mo ji snyed pa yang theg pa gsum du 'dus te/_gdul bya rjes su gzung ba'i phyir/_/theg pa mchog gsum ston pa po/_/don yod zhags pa rnam par rgyal/_/'dzin
[\[17b.6\]]pa chen po rdo rje zhags/_/rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa che/_/zhes pa smos te/_nyan thos dang /_rang rgyal ba dang /_theg pa chen po gsum gang zag gi blo dang sbyar nas gang mos pa la ston par byed de/_des 'gro ba'i don yod par mdzad do/_/'khor ba las rgyal bar byed do/_/thugs rje'i
[\[17b.7\]]zhags pas gdul bya rjes su 'dzin pas de yang rgyu ci las 'byung na/_chos kyi sku rdo rje lta bu rtogs pa las 'byung ngo /_/de yang /_/stong nyid chos skur rtogs pa'i rtags/_/byams dang snying rjes rab tu 'phel/_/zhes pa lta bu'o/_/thugs rjes gdul bya rjes su 'dzin pas
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]lcags kyu dang 'dra/_nyon mongs pa rnams 'ching bas zhags pa dang 'dra/_de nyid la yang ma zhen pas che zhes bya'o/_/da ni me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi sgo nas 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i mtshan bstan pa'i phyir/_rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs par byed/_/ces bya ba
[\[18a.2\]]la sogs pa smos te/_'dir khro bo gshin rje gshed kyi ming bstan te/_de yang rdo rje'i rigs yin pas rdo rje'o/_/shin tu 'jigs par byed pa'i cha byad du bstan nas/_ma hA de ba la sogs pa dang /_las kyi gshin rje rnams zhi bas mi 'dul ba de dag 'jigs shing skrag par byed pas 'dul
[\[18a.3\]]ba'o/_/khro bo'i rgyal po gdong drug 'jigs/_/mig drug lag drug stobs dang ldan/_/keng rus mche ba gtsigs pa po/_/zhes pa 'dis yon tan rtags kyi phyag rgya bstan te/_khro bo ni gsod pa dang skrod pa la sogs pa drag po'i cha byad du ston te/_de yang /_/gsod dang skrod dang drag por
[\[18a.4\]]ston/_/'di ni khro bo'i don du brjod/_/ces pa lta bu'o/_/de'i nang du me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis nyon mongs pa zhe sdang la sogs pa bcom pa'i rtags so/_/de ni khro bo rnams kyi nang na gtso bor gyur pas rgyal po'o/_/de yang rigs drug dang ldan pa'i rtags su gdong drug go/_/ye shes
[\[18a.5\]]drug dang ldan pa'i rtags su mig drug go/_/pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i rtags su lag pa drug go/_/gdug pa 'joms par byed pa'i stobs dang ldan pa'o/_/mi mgo skam rlon gyis brgyan pas keng rus so/_/nges par 'byed pa'i shes rab rnon pos nyon mongs pa 'joms shing /_
[\[18a.6\]]gdug pa can 'dul ba'i rtags su mche ba gtsigs pa'o/_/ha la ha la gdong brgya pa/_/zhes pa 'dis 'jigs byed chen po'i rgyan bstan te/_ha la ni dug ste/_dug bzhi dang ldan pa'i sprul gyis lus dang yan lag brgyan pa'o/_/gshin rje gshed po bgegs kyi rgyal/_/rdo rje shugs
[\[18a.7\]]can 'jigs byed pa/_/zhes pa 'dis ni sku'i phrin las bstan te/_'di las kyi gshin rje rnams 'dul ba'i gshed du gyur pa ste/_bgegs kyi rgyal po byin ya ka dang /_tshogs bdag glang sna la sogs pa rnams 'dul bar byed pas rgyal po'o/_/rdo rje ltar phrin las thogs pa med par
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]mdzad pa'i shugs chen po dang ldan pa'i sgo nas gdug pa can rnams 'jigs shing skrag par mdzad pa'o/_/rdo rje'i grags pa'i khyad par ji tsam zhe na/_/rdo rje grags pa rdo rje snying /_/zhes smos te/_chos thams cad rdo rje ltar dbyer mi phyed cing /_'jig rten gsum du grags pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa'o/_/_
[\[18b.2\]]dbyer mi phyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste/_chos thams cad kyi 'phro bar gyur pa'i gzhir gyur pas kyang snying po/_rdo rje lta bu thugs kyi rigs yin pas kyang rdo rje'i snying /_rtags khro bo rnams kyi thugs kar bzhag pas kyang rdo rje'i snying ngo /_/sku de'i yon tan bstan pa ni/_/sgyu 'phrul rdo rje gsus po che/_/_
[\[18b.3\]]zhes smos te/_sgyu ma lta bu'i sprul pa sna tshogs su sprul zhing /_rdo rje lta bu'i sku de yang nang du che ba'i yon tan thams cad kyis gang ba'i rtags su gsus khyim che ba'o/_/de'i rgyu ci zhe na/_rdo rje las skyes rdo rje'i bdag_/ces pa smos te/_de'i rgyu ni chos sku rdo rje lta bu rtogs pa las skyes te/_rigs
[\[18b.4\]]thams cad kyi gtso bor gyur pas bdag po'o/_/de'i dpe ni/_/rdo rje snying po mkha' 'dra ba/_/zhes smos te/_dngos po med pa dang /_kun la khyab pa dang /_cho 'phrul mi 'gag pa'i phyir nam mkha'o/_/'o na mtshan ma can du mi 'gyur ram zhe na/_/mi g.yo ral pa gcig gis bsgyings/_/_
[\[18b.5\]]glang chen ko rlon gos su gyon/_/zhes pa 'dis yon tan gyi rgyan bstan te mtshan ma'i rnam par rtog pa mi g.yo zhing /_gnyis su med par rtogs pa'i rtags ral pa'i thor tshugs gcig tu bcings pa'o/_/theg pa mchog dang ldan pa'i rtags su glang po che'i ko rlon gos su gyon pa'o/_/khro bo'i
[\[18b.6\]]gsung ji lta bu zhe na/_/drag chen ha ha zhes sgrogs pa/_/hi hi zhes sgrogs 'jigs par byed/_/gad mo chen mo gad rgyangs can/_/rdo rje gad mo cher sgrogs pa/_/zhes smos te/_'gro ba'i don mdzad pa la dgyes pas ha ha zhes pa'i sgra sgrogs shing /_hi hi zhes pa'i sgras ma rungs pa rnams
[\[18b.7\]]'jigs shing brgyal bar byed pa'i gad mo che bar sgrogs te/_rdo rje dang 'dra bar gzhan gyis bar du mi chod par shin tu rgya che ba ste/_'jig rten gsum na thos par sgrogs pa'o/_/'o na thugs kyi rang bzhin ji lta bu lags she na/_rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che/_/rdo rje rgyal
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]po bde ba che/_/rdo rje drag po dga' ba che/_/rdo rje hUM ste hUM zhes sgrogs/_/zhes smos te/_rdo rje ltar mi phyed pa'i thugs ye shes chen po/_chos kyi dbyings la sems pa dang /_thugs rjes 'gro ba'i don la sems pa'o/_/de'i gong na gzhan med pas rgyal po'o/_/zag
[\[19a.2\]]pa med pa'i bde ba chen po mnga' zhing /_gdug pa can 'joms pa'i thugs mnga' bas drag po'o/_/des sems can rnams kyi dga' ba chen po skyed par mdzad do/_/rdo rje lta bu thugs su chud pa'i sgo nas/_hUM hUM zhes pa'i sgra bsgrags nas/_gdug pa can tshar gcod par mdzad
[\[19a.3\]]do/_/khro bo de las ci mdzad ce na/_mtshon du rdo rje mda' thogs pa/_/rdo rje ral gris ma lus gcod/_/rdo rje kun 'chang rdo rje can/_/rdo rje gcig pu g.yul sel ba/_/zhes smos te/_phyag mtshan rdo rje ltar nyon mongs pa 'bigs pa'i thabs shes rab kyi mda' gzhu dang /_rnam par
[\[19a.4\]]rtog pa gcod par byed pa'i/_shes rab kyi ral gri thogs pa dang /_dug lnga choms pa'i rtags rdo rje 'chang ba dang /_rdo rje ltar gzhan 'joms par byed pa'i mthu dang ldan pas rdo rje can zhes bya'o/_/de yang rdo rje lta bu gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyis bdud bzhi dang gdug pa can 'joms
[\[19a.5\]]shing g.yul do zlog par byed do/_/rgyan gyi sgo nas khyad par gyi yon tan bstan pa ni/_/rdo rje 'bar ba mig mi bzad/_/sgra yang rdo rje 'bar ba ste/_/rdo rje 'bebs pa 'bebs pa che/_/mig brgya ba ste rdo rje'i mig_/lus ni rdo rje'i ba spu can/_/rdo rje'i spu ni gcig pu lus/_/sen mo skyes
[\[19a.6\]]ba rdo rje rtse/_/rdo rje snying po pags pa mkhregs/_/rdo rje phreng thogs dpal dang ldan/_/rdo rje rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste/_/zhes smos te/_rdo rje 'bar ba lta bu'i drag po'i spyan shin tu mi bzad par 'jigs pa mnga' zhing dbu skra yang rdo rje'i skra'o/_/gzhan gyi rgyud la yang sku gsung thugs rdo rje lta bu'i
[\[19a.7\]]ye shes 'bebs par mdzad la mig brgya pa zhes pa ni mtshon pa tsam ste/_thams cad du ma 'gags pa shes rab kyi spyan dbyer mi phyed ba dang ldan pa'o/_/lus la rdo rje'i ba spu dngos su 'khyil ba mnga' zhing /_rdo rje'i spu de gnyis su med pa'i lus la brgyan pa'o/_/gdug pa can
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]'dul ba'i rtags dang /_rigs lnga ye shes lnga dbyer mi phyed pa'i rtags su sor mo'i rtse mor rdo rje skyes pa'o/_/thams cad gnyis med du bsdus pa'i rtags su/_rdo rje'i pags pa sra la 'thas pa mnga' ba'o/_/rdo rje'i phreng ba thogs nas gzhan don mdzad pas dpal dang ldan pa'o/_/_
[\[19b.2\]]che ba'i yon tan phreng ba brgyus pa ltar rgyun mi 'chad pa dang ldan pa'i rtags so/_/de ltar khyad par gyi rgyan rdo rjes brgyan pa'i sgo nas che ba'i yon tan rnams bstan pa yin te/_/thugs rdo rje'i rigs yin pa'i phyir ro/_/'o na gsung gi sgo nas 'gro ba 'dren pa'i yon tan gang zhe na/_gad
[\[19b.3\]]rgyangs ha ha nges par sgrogs/_/yi ge drug pa rdo rje'i sgra/_/'jam dbyangs chen po sgra che ba/_/'jig rten gsum na sgra gcig pa/_/nam mkha'i mtha' la sgra sgrogs pa/_/sgra dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog_/ces smos te/_'gro ba'i don mdzad pa la dgyes pa'i sgra ha ha zhes sgrogs shing /_
[\[19b.4\]]yi ge drug pa ni rgyas par yi ge drug pa'i sngags/_de las bsdu na bA gI shwa ri'i 'bru drug pa'o/_/de gnyis ni gsang sngags rdo rje'i theg pa'i sgra'o/_/las 'phro can rnams la snyan cing yid du 'ong bas 'jam dbyangs so/_/don chen po ston pa'i sgra yin pas che bas so/_/de gang du sgrogs
[\[19b.5\]]ni 'jig rten gsum du'o/_/gnyis med ston pa'i sgra yin pas gcig go/_/yang ji snyed cig bsgrags kyang 'gro ba 'dren par gcig pa'o/_/sgra de la 'gran zla med pas kyang sgra gcig pa'o/_/de ji tsam du sgrogs she na/_nam mkha' khyab par sgrogs pa'o/_/sgra rnams kyi nang na
[\[19b.6\]]chos kyi sgra 'di mchog tu gyur pa ste don chen po la sbyor ba'i phyir ro/_/so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi sgo nas 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i mtshan bstan pa'i phyir/_/yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid/_/yang dag mtha' ste yi ge med/_/ces pa la sogs pa smos te/_de la gsung
[\[19b.7\]]gi rgyu ni yang dag pa bdag med de bzhin nyid do/_/gsung gi che ba ni/_stong nyid smra ba'i khyu mchog ste/_/zab cing rgya che sgra sgrogs pa/_/chos kyi dung ste sgra chen ldan/_/chos kyi gaN+DI sgra bo che/_/mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa po/_/phyogs bcu chos kyi rnga bo che/_/zhes smos te/_chos
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]thams cad stong pa nyid du smra ba ni smra ba thams cad kyi gtso bo yin pas khyu mchog ste/_dper na/_glang po che'i phru gu pha ma shi nas seng ges nu ma bsnun nas gsos pa la khyu mchog zer te/_des khyus 'gro zil gyis gnon te de dang 'dra ba'i phyir ro/_/ci'i mchog yin
[\[20a.2\]]na/_zab pa dang rgya che ba'i chos kyi sgra sgrogs pa'i phyir ro/_/chos 'byung ba'i snga ltas ni/_chos kyi dung lta bu'i sgra chen pos bdud btul nas/_chos kyi gaN+DI lta bu'i sgra chen pos 'khor bsdus nas/_mtha' gnyis la mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos ston pa ste/_de yang shes
[\[20a.3\]]pas srid la mi gnas dang /_/snying rjes zhi la mi gnas shing /_/zhes pa lta bu'o/_/rgya ji tsam che zhe na/_phyogs bcu thams cad du khyab par byed pa'o/_/gang gis she na/_chos kyi sgra chen po rnga bo che dang 'dra ba sgrogs pa'o/_/de la kun 'byung ba'i gzhi gang zhe na/_gzugs med
[\[20a.4\]]gzugs bzang dam pa ste/_/sna tshogs gzugs can yid las skyes/_/gzugs rnams thams cad snang ba'i dpal/_/gzugs brnyan ma lus 'chang ba po/_/zhes smos te/_chos sku la ngo bo nyid ma grub pas gzugs med pa'o/_/de'i byin gyi rlabs las longs spyod rdzogs
[\[20a.5\]]pa'i sku mtshan dang dpe byad kyis brgyan pa/_gzugs bzang ba'i dam pa'o/_/sprul sku sna tshogs gzugs can de yid ye shes su grol ba las skyes zhes pa dang /_yang sprul sku sna tshogs gzugs can gyi yid la ji ltar 'dod pa ltar skyes zhes bshad do/_/rje btsun de nyid nyan
[\[20a.6\]]thos dang /_rang rgyal ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_tshangs ba dang /_khyab 'jug la sogs pa'i gzugs brnyan ma lus par snang nas don mdzad pa'o/_/sku de'i che ba ji lta bu zhe na/_mtshungs pa med cing che bar grags/_/khams gsum dbang phyug chen po ste/_
[\[20a.7\]]'phags lam shin tu mtho la gnas/_/dar ba chen po chos kyi tog_/ces smos te/_tshogs gnyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i dbang gis gnyen po gang gis kyang mi tshugs te/_bdud dang mu stegs la sogs pa gang gis kyang zil gyis mi non pas na che bar grags so/_/de yang
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]'phags pa'i lam las mtho bar gyur pas gnyis su med pa'i ye shes la gnas pa'o/_/chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong mkhyen pas dar ba chen po'i chos so/_/gnyis su med pa ni rab rtse mo'i tog ces bya'o/_/de gdul bya la ji ltar mos par snang ba ni/_'jig rten gsum na gzhon
[\[20b.2\]]lus gcig_/gnas brtan rgan po skye dgu'i bdag_/sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'tshang ba/_/sbu gu 'jig rten gsum na mdzes/_/zhes smos te/_byang chub sems dpas 'dul ba rnams la bgres rgud mi mnga' ste rtag tu byis pa lo brgyad lon pa lta bu gzhan gyi yid 'phrog par byed pa lta
[\[20b.3\]]bus don mdzad pa'o/_/nyan thos kyis 'dul ba rnams la gnas brtan rab 'byor lta bur sprul/_rang rgyal bas 'dul ba rnams la rang rgyal rgan po rdzu 'phrul cher ston pa lta bur sprul/_sna tshogs kyis 'dul ba la skye dgu'i bdag por sprul nas don mdzad de/_de la skye ba dgu ni
[\[20b.4\]]nyan thos dang /_rang rgyal ba dang /_theg pa chen po dang gsum/_de'i khar 'gro ba rigs drug gi gnas su sprul sku thub pa drug gis don mdzad pa dang /_dgu la bya'o/_/de la mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis ni thun mong du bstan to/_/phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa nyid dang /_zhabs
[\[20b.5\]]rus sbal bzhin du gnas pa dang /_phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo 'brel ba dang /_phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa dang /_bdun mtho ba dang /_phyag gi sor mo ring ba dang /_rting pa yangs pa dang /_sku che zhing drang ba dang /_'bur mi mngon pa dang /_sku'i spu gyen du 'khyil ba dang /_
[\[20b.6\]]byin pa ri dwags e na ya lta bu dang /_phyag ring zhing mdzes pa dang /_mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa dang /_sku mdog gser lta bu dang /_pags pa 'jam pa dang /_spu re re nas g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang /_zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa dang /_ro stod seng ge 'dra ba dang /_
[\[20b.7\]]dpung mgo zlum pa dang /_thal gong rgyas pa dang /_ro bro ba'i mchog mkhyen pa dang /_shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa dang /_dbu gtsug tor dang ldan pa dang /_ljags ring ba dang /_gsung tshangs pa'i dbyangs lta bu dang /_'gram pa seng ge'i 'dra ba dang /_tshems dkar ba dang /_
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]tshems mnyam pa dang /_tshems thags bzang ba dang /_tshems bzhi bcu mda' ba dang /_spyan mthon mthing du gnas pa dang /_spyan rdzi ba'i rdzi ma lta bu'o/_/khyad par gyi dbang du byas na/_dpal rnam par snang mdzad la rgyu'i sems dpa' bcu drug 'bras bu'i sems
[\[21a.2\]]dpa' bcu drug gis brgyan pa la bshad do/_/de ltar 'jig rten gsum na shin tu sdug cing yid du 'ong la/_blta bas chog mi shes pa 'dun pa skyes bu'i gnas su gyur pa'o/_/des 'jig rten pa ji ltar skyob ce na/_/'jig rten shes legs slob dpon te/_/'jig rten slob dpon
[\[21a.3\]]'jigs pa med/_/mgon skyob 'jig rten yid gcugs pa/_/skyabs dang skyob pa bla na med/_/ces smos te/_'jig rten pa'i sman dang bzo la sogs pa yang rje btsun nyid kyis bslabs pa yin la/_log pa'i lam las zlog cing dam pa'i lam ston pa'i slob dpon yang mdzad do/_/_
[\[21a.4\]]tha snyad kyi rigs pa dang ldan pas gzhan gyis brtsad bcad kyang 'jigs pa dang bag tsha ba med par 'jig rten skyob pa ste/_ji ltar yid dang mthun par sngar gyi yang skyobs mdzad la/_phyis kyang skyob ste bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par byed do/_/'o na thugs kyi mkhyen tshad ci mnga' zhe na/_
[\[21a.5\]]nam mkha'i mtha' la longs spyod pa/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mtsho/_/zhes pa/_chos kyi sku nam mkha'i mtha' lta bu la longs spyod cing rtogs pas shes bya ji lta ba dang ji snyed pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes che ba'i yon tan rgya mtsho lta bu mda' ba'o/_/de'i byed pa'i
[\[21a.6\]]las gang zhe na/_ma rig sgo nga'i sbubs 'byed pa/_/srid pa'i dra ba 'joms pa po/_/nyon mongs ma lus zhi byed pa/_/'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin/_/zhes smos te/_gnyis su med pa'i don rtogs pas ma rig sgo nga'i shun lpags 'dra ba sbubs phye nas srid pa'i dra ba las dang nyon
[\[21a.7\]]mongs pa dang 'brel ba rnams bcom ste/_nyon mongs pa rtsa ba lnga'am drug dang /_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa nyi shu po dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa ste brgya dang gsum lta bu zhi nas 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin pa'o/_/de rtogs pa'i phan yon ni/_/ye shes dbang bskur cod pan
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]can/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyan du thogs/_/sdug bsngal gsum gyi sdug bsngal zhi/_/gsum sel mtha' yas grol gsum thob/_/sgrib pa kun las nges par grol/_/mkha' ltar mnyam pa nyid la gnas/_/nyon mongs dri ma kun las 'das/_/zhes smos te/_gnyis
[\[21b.2\]]su med pa'i don rtogs pas nyon mongs pa lnga ma spangs rang sar grol te/_ye shes lngar snang ba ste/_bum pa la sogs pa'i dbang la ltos pa ma yin te/_ye shes gcig rdzogs kyi dbang zhes bya'o/_/bzhi rig pa gcig la snang tshul ye shes kyis brgyan pa de shin tu mdzes pa'i
[\[21b.3\]]phyir cod pan no/_/de yang /_/sems kyis chos la dbang thob na/_/rdzas tshig mtshan ma'i dbang rnams kun/_/ma bskur kyang ni thob par 'gyur/_/zhes pa lta bu'o/_/ye shes lnga'i gzugs brnyan sangs rgyas lngar shar te/_gsal zhing mdzes pa'i phyir rgyan zhes bya'o/_/sdug
[\[21b.4\]]bsngal ni gsum du 'dus/_/de ltar rtog pas sdug bsngal gya sdug bsngal dang /_'du byed kyi sdug bsngal dang /_'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal dang gsum zhi la/_nyon mongs pa rnams kyang dug gsum du 'dus te/_des sel zhing spong ngo /_/de gsum bsal nas 'gro ba mtha' yas pa'i
[\[21b.5\]]don byas nas/_grol ba nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang gsum thob par byed do/_/khyad par du sku gsum la bya'o/_/de yang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /_shes bya'i sgrib pa kun las grol nas/_nam mkha' lta bu'i mnyam pa nyid la gnas te/_
[\[21b.6\]]de phan tshod nyon mongs pa'i dri ma las 'das pa'o/_/de ltar rtogs pa'i ngo bo ci zhe na/_/dus gsum dus med rtog pa po/_/sems can kun gyi gtso bo che/_/yon tan thod can rnams kyi thod/_/lus kun las ni rnam grol ba/_/nam mkha'i lam la rab gnas pa/_/zhes smos te/_mnyam pa nyid la dus gsum
[\[21b.7\]]du dbyer med de/_de yang /_'das pa'i de bzhin nyid gang ma 'ongs de bzhin nyid/_/da ltar de bzhin nyid 'di thams cad bye brag med/_/ces pa lta bu'o/_/de ltar rtogs pa ni sems can kun las ches khyad par 'phags pas gtso bo che'o/_/de yang /_/'jig rten pa bas nyan
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]thos yon tan che la/_de las kyang rang rgyal ba/_de las kyang byang chub sems dpa'/_de bas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan che ba rnams zhes bya'o/_/thod ni yon tan gyis mdzes par brgyan pa'o/_/de las kyang thod ltar mdzes shing rab tu gyur pa ni rje btsun
[\[22a.2\]]nyid do/_/de ltar 'gro ba'i lus kun du skye ba grol nas nam mkha' lta bu'i ye shes la gnas so/_/'o na 'gro ba'i don ji ltar mdzad na/_yid bzhin nor bu chen po 'chang /_/khyab bdag rin chen kun gyi bdag_/dpag bsam shing chen rgyas pa ste/_/bum pa bzang po che ba'i
[\[22a.3\]]mchog_/byed pa sems can kun don byed/_/phan 'dogs sems can mnyes gshin pa/_/zhes smos te/_gzhan don 'byung ba'i dpe yid bzhin nor bu la yang chos brgyad de/_sems can gyi dgos 'dod 'byung ba dang /_de yang gsol ba ma btab na mi 'byung ba dang btab na
[\[22a.4\]]'byung ba dang /_dus su 'byung ba dang /_ji ltar 'tsham par 'byung ba dang /_zad mi shes par 'byung ba dang /_rtog pa med par 'byung ba dang /_phyis lan la re ba med pa'o/_/de dang 'dra ba'i yon tan rin po che lta bu des kun la khyab pa'i bdag nyid do/_/yang dpag bsam shing dang 'dra
[\[22a.5\]]ste/_de la yang chos bcu ste/_snga ma brgyad kyi khar bsil ba dang /_'gro ba ngal sos pa'i gnas su gyur pa lta bu dang bcu'o/_/yang bum pa bzang po bsgrub pa dang 'dra ste/_de la chos bcu ste/_snga ma brgyad kyi khar/_bsgrubs na 'byung ba dang /_ma bsgrubs na mi 'byung ba dang bcu'o/_/_
[\[22a.6\]]de yang /_/bum pa bzang po dang ni dpag bsam shing /_/yid bzhin nor rnams sems dang mi ldan pas/_/sems can rnams kyi don ni 'byung 'gyur na/_/thugs rje cher mnga' rgyal ba smos ci dgos/_/zhes pa lta bu'o/_/de ltar bu gcig pa'i ma ltar phan 'dogs pa'o/_/_
[\[22a.7\]]des gdul bya'i bsam pa ji ltar mkhyen ce na/_bzang ngan shes shing dus shes la/_/khyab bdag dam shes dam tshig ldan/_/dus shes sems can dbang don shes/_/rnam grol gsum la mkhas pa po/_/yon tan ldan zhing yon tan shes/_/zhes smos te/_las bzang ngan shes
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]shing /_de'i 'bras bu dus ji tsam na 'byung shes la/_thugs rjes kun la khyab pa'i bdag po gzhan gyi tshig kyang shes la/_rang yang de kho na las mi 'da' ba'i dam tshig dang ldan pa'o/_/don mdzad pa'i tshe 'dul ba'i dus tshod shes shing sems can gyi dbang po rab 'bring tha ma dang /_
[\[22b.2\]]dad pa dang brtson 'grus rab 'bring tha ma'i don shes pa'o/_/de yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mnga' bas/_nyan thos dang /_rang rgyal ba dang /_theg pa chen po dang rnam grol gsum la mkhas pa'o/_/sku dang ye shes stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang
[\[22b.3\]]rje btsun nyid kyang ldan zhing /_nyan thos dang /_rang rgyal ba la sogs pa'i rgyud la yod pa'i yon tan rnams kyang shes pa'o/_/de ltar gyur pa'i bkra shis pa'i dam par bstan pa'i phyir/_/chos shes bkra shis bkra shis 'byung /_/bkra shis kun gyi bkra shis pa/_/grags pa'i bkra shis
[\[22b.4\]]snyan grags dge/_/dbugs 'byin chen po dga' ston che/_/dga' chen rol mo chen po ste/_/zhes smos te/_de ltar chos kyi don shes pas tshe 'dir yang legs pa'i yon tan kun 'byung bas bkra shis la/_phyi mar yang legs pa'i yon tan kun 'byung bas bkra shis 'byung ngo /_/_
[\[22b.5\]]'jig rten pa'i tshe ring ba dang /_nor dang rigs rgyud 'phel ba la sogs pa bkra shis pa rnams kyi nang na yang bkra shis dam pa 'gyur ro/_/khams gsum du grags shing legs pa'i yon tan 'byung bas grags pa'i bkra shis so/_/mi dge ba las log nas dge ba sna tshogs la zhugs
[\[22b.6\]]pas snyan grags dge ba'o/_/'gro ba rnams thar pa'i lam du dbugs 'byin pas kun dga' ba'i chos kyi ston mo chen po mdzad cing /_zag med kyi bde ba chen po thob pas dga' chen no/_/'dod pa'i yon tan mi spong bas rol mo chen po zhes bya'o/_/des 'gro ba skyob pa'i tshul ni/_
[\[22b.7\]]bkur sti rim gro phun sum tshogs/_/mchog tu dga' ba'i grags bdag dpal/_/mchog ldan mchog sbyin gtso bo ste/_/skyabs kyi dam pa skyabs su 'os/_/'jig rten dgra ste rab kyi mchog_/'jigs pa ma lus sel ba po/_/zhes smos te/_kun gyis bkur ba dang /_rim gror
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]bya ba'i 'os ni 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyi gter du gyur pa/_mchog tu 'gro ba'i don la dga' ba/_khams gsum du grags shing tshogs gnyis rdzogs pas dpal te/_yon tan gyi skal ba mchog dang ldan
[\[23a.2\]]zhing /_gzhan yang mchog ster ba'i gtso bor gyur pa'o/_/des sdug bsngal ba rnams 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa las skyob cing de las lhag pa med pas skyabs su 'os pa'o/_/ci las skyob ce na/_'jig rten gyi rtog pa dgra yin te/_de las skyob pa'o/_/de yang 'jig rten las rab tu gyur pas
[\[23a.3\]]nyan thos so/_/de las rab tu gyur pas rang rgyal lo/_/de las rab tu gyur pas byang chub sems dpa'o/_/de dag las kyang mchog tu gyur pa rje btsun no/_/des bdud dang sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar byed pa'o/_/mu stegs kyi cha byad kyis 'dul ba la der sprul nas 'gro ba'i don
[\[23a.4\]]mdzad pa'i phyir/_gtsug phud phud bu lcang lo can/_/ral pa muny+dza cod pan thogs/_/gdong lnga gtsug phud lnga dang ldan/_/zur phud lnga pa me tog thod/_/ces smos te/_gtsug phud ni skra dang kha spu bzhar bregs nas spyi bor gtsug phud tsam 'dzin pas 'dul ba der sprul lo/_/_
[\[23a.5\]]phud pu ni skra gzhan bregs nas dpral bar bcings pa'o/_/lcang lo can ni skra sil bu ring ba'o/_/ral pa ni ral pa sog kha non pa ni/_lha chen po la dad pa rnams kyi gzugs 'dzin pa'o/_/muny+dza ni rked sor slebs pa'i ral pa ske rags su bcings pa'o/_/cod pan ni dar la
[\[23a.6\]]sogs pa thod du bcings pa'o/_/tha ma cod pan du 'phur ba'o/_/gdong lnga ni phyogs bzhin gdong pa bzhi/_spyi bo'i gtsug na gcig ste lnga'o/_/gdong pa bzhi nas rig byed kyi sgra bzhi 'don te/_shar nas nges brjod kyi rig byed/_lho nas mchod brjod kyi rig byed/_nub nas snyan
[\[23a.7\]]dngags kyi rig byed/_byang nas srid srung gi rig byed 'don pa'o/_/de ltar tshangs pa gdong lnga pa lta bus 'dul ba der sprul lo/_/yang mgo la gtsug phud lnga dang ldan pa mu stegs gzegs zan gyi gzugs kyis 'dul ba la des sprul lo/_/yang mgo la rin po che'i zur phud lnga
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]yong pa dri za'i gzugs kyis 'dul ba la der sprul lo/_/yang mgo la me tog gi thod bcings pas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i gzugs kyis 'dul ba la der sprul lo/_/'o na sangs rgyas pa'i brtul zhugs ji ltar 'dzin zhe na/_/mgo zlum brtul zhugs chen po 'chang /_/tshangs
[\[23b.2\]]par spyod pa brtul zhugs mchog_/dka' thub mthar phyin dka' thub che/_/gtsang gnas dam pa gau tam/_/bram ze tshangs pa tshangs pa shes/_/zhes smos te/_shAkya thub pa lta bu'i rab tu byung bas 'dul ba la mgo zlum du sprul nas gnod pa las zlog pa'i brtul zhugs 'dzin par mdzad do/_/_
[\[23b.3\]]yang tshangs par spyod pa'i sdom pa la gnas shing brtul zhugs 'dzin pas 'dul ba la der ston to/_/shAkya thub pa chu bo ne ra dzA rar dka' thub mdzad pa lta bu la yang der ston to/_/gau ta ma ni shAkya'i rigs te/_/gtsang sbra la gnas pa rgyal rigs su sprul pa dang /_rang bzhin gyis dka' thub
[\[23b.4\]]dang /_gtsang sbra la gnas pa bram ze lta bur kyang sprul pa mdzad do/_/nyid la nyes pa'i skyon gyis ma gos pas tshangs pa/_gzhan skyon dang bral ba'i thabs shes pas tshangs pa shes zhes bya'o/_/de ltar sprul pa'i phan yon ci zhe na/_mya ngan 'das pa tshangs pa thob/_/grol ba thar pa rnam grol
[\[23b.5\]]lus/_/rnam grol zhi ba zhi ba nyid/_/mya ngan 'das pa mya ngan 'das/_/legs par mya ngan 'das dang nye/_/bde sdug sel ba mthar gyur pa/_/zhes smos te/_'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dang bral bas mya ngan las 'das pa'o/_/de nyid la zhen pa dang bral bas tshangs pa thob pa'o/_/de ltar
[\[23b.6\]]'ching ba mtha' dag las grol zhing thar nas ye shes kyi sku thob ste/_des yon tan thams cad 'byung ba'i rten byed pas lus zhes bya'o/_/de ltar nyon mongs pa las grol zhing spros pa'i mtshan ma thams cad zhi bas zhi ba'o/_/zhi ba de nyid las mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos kyi yon tan rnams
[\[23b.7\]]'byung ste/_mya ngan las 'das pa ni nyan thos kyi lam mo/_/mya ngan las 'das pa phyi ma ni rang rgyal ba'i lam mo/_/legs par mya ngan las 'das pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams so/_/bde ba mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha' dang /_sdug bsngal 'khor ba'i mtha' gnyis sel te/_
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]mthar gyur pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa ni sangs rgyas nyid do/_/gzhi'i gnas lugs rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo nyid du bstan pa'i phyir/_chags bral lus las 'das pa po/_/thub pa med pa dpe med pa/_/mi mngon mi snang gsal byed min/_/mi 'gyur kun 'gro
[\[24a.2\]]khyab pa po/_/phra zhing zag med sa bon bral/_/rdul med rdul bral dri ma med/_/nyes pa spangs pa skyon med pa/_/zhes smos te/_yul rnams la chags pa'i blo dang bral ba'i ye shes su snang ba las 'das te/_de nyid mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi stobs kyis mi brdzi bas thub pa med do/_/gang
[\[24a.3\]]dang yang mnyam pa med pas dpe med do/_/'di mtshan nyid dngos po cir yang mi mthong la mtshan ma gang du yang mi snang ste/_rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i bdag nyid du gnas pas don la gsal byed mi dgos te mar me lta bu'o/_/'dus ma byas pa'i rkyen gang gis kyang mi 'gyur zhing /_bde
[\[24a.4\]]gshegs kyi snying po kun grol des til 'bru la mar bzhin kun la khyab po/_/rtul pos mi shes pas phra zhing zag pa ste srid par skye ba'i sa bon ma rig pa bdag tu 'dzin pa dang bral ba'o/_/de ltar gzhi la rnam par rtog pa'i rdul dag nas med la/_de ma rtogs pa'i blo yang de nyid/_rtogs
[\[24a.5\]]na rtogs pa'i rdul dang bral bar 'gyur la/_de nyid la yang ma zhen pas dri ma med pa'o/_/de ltar sgrib gnyis spangs pas nyes pa'i skyon gang yang med pa'o/_/don gnyis su med pa lhun gyis grub pa'i tshul ni/_/shin tu sad pa sad pa'i bdag_/kun shes kun rig dam pa po/_/rnam par
[\[24a.6\]]shes pa'i chos nyid 'das/_/ye shes gnyis med tshul 'chang ba/_/rnam par rtog med lhun gyis grub/_/ces smos te/_sgrib pa gnyis las sad pa'am/_yang na snang ba ye shes sus sad pa'am/_sems stong par sad pas ji snyed pa kun shes shing /_ji lta ba rig la/_de yang dbyer
[\[24a.7\]]med du shes pas dam pa'o/_/de ltar rtog pa dang bral bas rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyi klong du 'das pa'o/_/'das pa tsam na gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi tshul 'chang ba'o/_/rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba'i ye shes rgyu rkyen med par lhun gyis grub pa ste/_ngo bo lhun grub po/_/de la yon tan
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]thams cad lhun gyis grub pas yon tan lhun grub po/_/rgyu rkyen gyis ji ltar ma bskyed ce na/_dus gsum sangs rgyas las byed pa/_/sangs rgyas thog ma tha ma med/_/dang po'i sangs rgyas rgyu med pa/_/ye shes mig gcig dri ma med/_/ye shes lus can de bzhin gshegs/_/zhes smos te/_
[\[24b.2\]]dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis sems can 'dren pa'i las mdzad de/_sangs rgyas la thog ma 'di nas byung bya ba dang /_tha ma 'dir song bya ba med de dang po nyid nas rgyu med pa'o/_/de la gnyis 'dzin gyi dri ma med pas ye shes mig gcig go/_/ye shes drug ro gcig pa'i lus yin
[\[24b.3\]]pas de skad ces bya'o/_/de la gsung gi khyad par ci zhe na/_/tshig gi dbang phyug smra ba che/_/smra ba'i skyes mchog smra ba'i rgyal/_/smra ba'i dam pa mchog gi gnas/_/smra ba'i seng ge mtshungs pa med/_/ces smras te/_zab cing rgya che ba'i chos gsungs pas tshig gi dbang phyug smra ba che'o/_/mu stegs
[\[24b.4\]]kyi smra ba las mchog tu gyur cing /_nyan thos kyi smra ba zil gyis gnon pas smra ba'i rgyal lo/_/rang rgyal ba'i smra ba las 'phags pas dam pa'o/_/skye med kyi sgra chos smra ba'i gong na gzhan med pas mchog gi gnas so/_/de ni seng ge dang 'dra ste bdud la sogs pa'i rgol bas mi tshugs so/_/_
[\[24b.5\]]'o na sku'i che ba gang zhe na/_/kun du lta ba mchog tu dga'/_/gzi brjid phung po blta na sdug_/'od bzangs 'bar ba dpal gyi be'u/_/lag na 'od 'bar snang ba po/_/zhes smos te/_shes rab dam pas don la lta zhing /_thugs rje dam pas 'gro ba la gzigs pas kun du lta ba'o/_/bde ba chen
[\[24b.6\]]po 'phags pas mchog tu dga'o/_/gzi brjid chen po gzhan yid du 'ong zhing sdug pa'i sku mnga' la/_nang na ye shes drug 'bar bas ma rig pa'i mun pa sel ba'i rtags phyi ru 'od kha dog drug 'bar ba'o/_/mtshan thun mong ma yin pa thugs ka na rin po che dpal be'us brgyan pa'o/_/phyag
[\[24b.7\]]las kyang 'od zer 'bar te zhi bas 'dul ba rnams 'dun pa skyed par byed la/_des mi 'dul ba rnams tshar gcod par byed do/_/des 'gro ba'i nad ji ltar sel zhe na/_/sman pa che mchog gtso bo ste/_/zug rngu 'byin pa bla na med/_/sman rnams ma lus ljon pa'i shing /_/nad do cog gi dgra che ba/_/zhes
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]smos te/_sman pa'i mchog ste bdag med kyi don bstan nas bdag 'dzin gyi zug rngu 'byin cing /_de yang sman gyi dpe ni ljon shing dang 'dra ste/_rtsa ba dang yal ga dang lo 'dab dang me tog la brten nas 'bras bu 'byung ba ltar rtsa ba ni byang chub sems so/_/yal ga ni rtogs
[\[25a.2\]]par byed pa'i thabs kyi yan lag rnams so/_/lo ma ni 'dir theg pa so so'i chos kyang bkag pa med pa'o/_/me tog ni rtogs pa'i nyams myong ngo /_/'bras bu ni de mthar phyin pa'o/_/der yang ma zad de phyi nang gi sman sna tshogs su yang sprul lo/_/des dgra phyi nang gi nad sel bar
[\[25a.3\]]byed do/_/'o na sku'i khyad par ci zhe na/_sdu gu 'jig rten gsum gyi mchog_/dpal ldan rgyu skar dkyil 'khor can/_/zhes smos te/_sems can gyi ngo bo la sdug cing mdzes par sprul nas don mdzad de/_dper na rgyu skar rnams kyi nang na zla ba ltar/_lha dang mi rnams zil gyis gnon pa'o/_/des
[\[25a.4\]]skyob pa'i thugs rje ji lta bu zhe na/_phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa/_/chos kyi rgyal mtshan legs par 'dzugs/_/'gro na gdugs gcig yangs pa ste/_/byams dang snying rje'i dkyil 'khor can/_/dpal ldan pad+ma gar gyi bdag_/khyab bdag chen po rin chen gdugs/_/_
[\[25a.5\]]zhes smos te/_/rgya ni phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam par dam pa'i chos sgrogs pa'i mtshan mar rgyal mtshan 'dzugs shing /_gdugs kyis char dang nyi ma la sogs pa skyob pa lta bu ni/_byams pa dang snying rjer ldan pa'i dbang gis so/_/de yang ma gos pa pad+ma dang 'dra la/_'gro ba
[\[25a.6\]]'dren pa'i thabs sna tshogs sgyur ba ni gar dang 'dra'o/_/de yang yon tan rin po che'i gdugs lta bus skyob pa'i bdag po ni rje btsun nyid do/_/ji ltar bstan kyang nges pa'i lam gcig las med pa'i phyir/_sangs rgyas kun gyi gzi brjid che/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi sku che ba/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi
[\[25a.7\]]rnal 'byor che/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi bstan pa gcig_/ces smos te/_rje btsun nyid la sangs rgyas kun gyi gzi brjid chen po mnga' la/_sangs rgyas kun gyi sku rnam pa gsum yang 'chang bar mdzad de/_thams cad rje btsun gyi sprul pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]'byor che/_/thabs dang shes rab kyi gtso bor yang zhugs la/_sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'i chos ji snyed cig gsungs kyang /_yang dag par na gnyis su med par ston pa'i theg pa gcig las med de/_de yang /_theg pa'i sgo mo bsam yas kyang /_/nges pa'i don du gcig las med/_/ces
[\[25b.2\]]pa lta bu'o/_/nges pa'i don gcig la ye shes lngar ji ltar snang zhe na/_rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur dpal/_/rin chen kun bdag dbang phyug ste/_/'jig rten dbang phyug kun gyi bdag_/rdo rje 'chang ba kun gyi rje/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs che ba/_/zhes smos te/_rdo rje ni tshur mi tshugs pa dang
[\[25b.3\]]phar shes bya 'bigs pa ste/_chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa la dbang thob pas/_/de ni me long lta bu'i ye shes mi bskyod pa'i ngo bo ste/_des zhe sdang rang kha ma 'dul bar byed pa'o/_/chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs te/_yon tan rin po che kun la dbang sgyur ba'i bdag po ni mnyam pa
[\[25b.4\]]nyid kyi ye shes rin chen 'byung ldan gyi ngo bo ste/_des nga rgyal dang ser sna rang kha ma 'dul lo/_/des 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyi ngo bo so so ma 'dres pa la gsal pa la dbang sgyur ba'i bdag po ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes snang ba mtha' yas kyi ngo bo ste/_des 'dod chags rang kham 'dul
[\[25b.5\]]lo/_/rdo rje ltar phrin las thogs pa med par 'chang ba ni bya ba grub pa'i ye shes don yod grub pa'i ngo bo ste/_des phrag dog dang le lo rang kham 'dul lo/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa chen po ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes rnam par snang mdzad kyi ngo bo ste/_des
[\[25b.6\]]gti mug rang kha ma 'dul lo/_/de dag kyang sku gsung thugs su 'dus tshul bstan pa'i phyir/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la gnas/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi sku che ba/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung yang yin/_/zhes smos te/_rje btsun gyi thugs ni ye shes drug ro gcig cing mnyam pa
[\[25b.7\]]ste/_des sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la khyab cing gnas pa'o/_/de yang shes bya ma lus pa mkhyen cing rig pas na thugs so/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi skur sprul pa yang rje btsun nyid yin pas sku rnams kyi nang na che ba'o/_/de yang khyab cing rten byed pa dang /_snang bas na sku'o/_/sangs
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]rgyas kun gyi gsung 'byung ba'i rgyu dang ngo bo nyid du yang rje btsun 'gyur ba ste/_gsal ba dang go bar byed pa dang grags pa'i phyir na gsung ngo /_/des gzhan gyi mun pa sel zhing ma gos pa ni/_/rdo rje nyi ma snang ba che/_/rdo rje zla ba dri med 'od/_/chags bral la sogs chags pa che/_/_
[\[26a.2\]]kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od/_/rdo rje skyil krung rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i chos 'dzin pa/_/dpal ldan sangs rgyas pad+ma skyes/_/zhes smos te/_gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyis srid pa'i rgya mtsho skems pas nyi ma che'o/_/ma rig pa'i mun pa sel ba'i zla ba'i 'od do/_/_
[\[26a.3\]]chags pa rang kha ma dang bral zhing don dang gdul bya la chags pa'o/_/yang na pha rol tu phyin pas 'dul ba'i gang zag la chags pa dang bral ba'i tshul du chos bshad la/_/gsang sngags kyi rigs can la chags pa rang rgyud du spyod pa'i tshul gyis chos bshad do/_/nang na ye shes dang thugs
[\[26a.4\]]rje'i 'od 'bar ba'i rtags/_phyi rol du kha dog sna tshogs kyi 'od 'bar ba'o/_/thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i rtags su rdo rje skyil krung du bzhugs pa'o/_/sangs rgyas rnams 'gro ba la byams pa'i chos 'dzin pa ni thugs mi rtog pa'i tshul gyis rang sgrar shar ba la bya'o/_/_
[\[26a.5\]]nyes skyon dang bral ba ni pad+ma lta bu ste/_/de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi skye gnas su gyur pa'o/_/tshul ji lta bu zhe na/_/kun mkhyen ye shes mdzod 'dzin pa/_/rgyal po sgyu 'phrul sna tshogs 'chang /_/che ba gsang sngags rig sngags 'chang /_/zhes smos te/_shes bya ji lta ba dang ji snyed pa
[\[26a.6\]]mkhyen pas kun mkhyen ye shes kyi mdzod 'dzin pa'o/_/yon tan gyi bgo skal las rgyal ba dang bdud las rgyal zhing sgyu ma lta bu'i sprul pa mos pa sna tshogs 'dul ba'i thabs sna tshogs 'chang ba'o/_/che ba'i yon tan khyad par du gsang sngags kyi ngo bo thabs shes rab dang /_rig
[\[26a.7\]]sngags kyi ngo bo shes rab dang ye shes 'chang ba'o/_/'o na shes rab kyi las gang zhe na/_/rdo rje rnon po ral gri che/_/yi ge mchog ste rnam par dag_/theg pa chen po sdug bsngal gcod/_/mtshon cha chen po rdo rje chos/_/rdo rje zab mo dzi na dzika_/rdo rje blo gros don bzhin rig_/ces
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]smos te/_gnyis su med pa'i ye shes ral gri dang 'dra bas bdag tu rtog pa thams cad gcod cing /_don mi 'gyur ba yi ge dang 'dra ste/_rtog pa'i dri mas ma gos pas mchog go/_/shes rab dang snying rjes khyad par byas nas theg pa chen po ste/_de rtogs pas sdug bsngal rtsa
[\[26b.2\]]ba nas gcod pa'o/_/de gcod pa'i mtshon cha ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes rdo rje lta bu'o/_/de lta bu'i zab mo ni rgyal ba'i yang rgyal po yin pas dzi na dzika go/_/shes rab chen po'i blo dang ldan pas/_shes bya ji lta ba rig pa'o/_/de ltar rig pas gdul bya la rgyu 'bras kyi theg pa ston pa ni/_
[\[26b.3\]]pha rol phyin pa kun rdzogs pa/_/sa rnams kun gyi rgyan dang ldan/_/rnam par dag pa bdag med chos/_/yang dag ye shes zla 'od bzang /_/brtson chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba ste/_/rgyud kun gyi ni bdag po mchog_/ces smos te/_rje btsun nyid la pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo rnams kyang rdzogs par
[\[26b.4\]]mnga' la/_sa bcu'i yon tan gyis kyang brgyan te/_ma gos pas rnam par dag pa bdag med chos so/_/yang dag pa'i ye shes zla ba'i 'od lta bus ma rig pa dang gdung ba sel zhing /_/'gro ba'i don la brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan te/_sgyu ma lta bu'i sprul pa sna tshogs ston cing /_khyad par
[\[26b.5\]]du rgyud thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa gnyis su med pa'i ye shes ston pa'o/_/rtsa ba byang chub kyi sems gnyis su med pas rgyal ba kun gyi snying por bstan pa'i phyir/_/rdo rje'i gdan ni ma lus ldan/_/ye shes sku rnams ma lus 'chang /_/kun du bzang po blo gros bzang /_/sa yi snying po 'gro
[\[26b.6\]]ba 'dzin/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po che/_/zhes smos te/_gzhi chos sku rdo rje lta bu'i rtogs pa las ye shes kyi sku sna tshogs 'byung zhing bzang ngan dang blang dor gang yang med pas kun du bzang la/_/bdag dang gzhan la phan pa mkhyen pas blo gros bzang ngo /_/sa bzhin du sems can la
[\[26b.7\]]phan pa'i yon tan skyed pa'i phyir dang /_snod kyi 'jig rten du sprul nas 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i phyir/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi sprul pa 'byung ba'i snying po chen por gyur pa'o/_/snying po de las sprul pa tshul ji ltar 'byung ba ni/_sprul pa'i 'khor lo sna tshogs 'chang /_/dngos po kun gyi
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]rang bzhin mchog_/dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'dzin/_/skye med chos de sna tshogs ston/_/zhes smos te/_rig pa byang chub sems cir yang 'char bas sgrub thabs kyi bye brag sna tshogs 'byung ba yin la/_der yang ma zad sku gsung thugs kyi sprul pa sna tshogs
[\[27a.2\]]'byung ba'i gzhi yin la/_snod bcud kyi dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin skye med du gnas pas kyang mchog go/_/don skye ba med pas kyang gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i bar lta bur kyang ma 'gags par shar bas rang bzhin 'dzin to/_/mdor na zab par skye ba med kyang rgya che ba sna
[\[27a.3\]]tshogs su ston to/_/zab pa dang rgya che ba gnyis su med pas theg pa thams cad kyi mchog ces bya'o/_/shes rab dam pa'i ngo bo ci zhe na/_/chos kun ngo bo nyid 'chang ba/_/shes rab chen pos skad cig la/_/chos kun khong du chud pa ste/_/chos kun mngon par rtogs pa ste/_/zhes smos te/_/_
[\[27a.4\]]chos phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sogs pa kun gyi ngo bo nyid ni mnyam pa chen po yin la/_de gang gis rtogs na shes rab chen pos skad cig la/_shes bya'i chos thams cad khong du chud de mngon sum du gsal bar rtogs pa'o/_/shes rab de'i
[\[27a.5\]]stobs ji lta bu zhe na/_/thub pa blo mchog 'byung po sel/_/mi g.yo rab tu dang ba'i bdag_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub 'chang /_/sangs rgyas kun gyi mngon sum pa/_/ye shes me lce 'od rab gsal/_/zhes smos te/_lus ngag yid gsum mi dge ba'i las la thub cing /_chos nyid
[\[27a.6\]]rtogs pa'i blo'i mchog yod pas rnam rtog gi gnod pa 'byung ba lta bu sel te/_mtshan ma gang gis kyang mi g.yo bar chu dang ba lta bu'i bdag nyid gsal la rtog pa med pa ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ste/_de yang lam la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas ni mchog mkhyen la/_sangs
[\[27a.7\]]rgyas kyis mngon sum mkhyen te/_ye shes de'i dpe ni me lce 'bar ba dang 'dra la/_ma rig pa sel ba dang nyon mongs pa sel ba dang /_srin bu me khyer la sogs pa'i 'od zil gyis gnon pa dang /_zhing khams grangs med du snang bar byed pa'o/_/da ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi sgo nas
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i mtshan bstan pa'i phyir/_/'dod pa'i don grub dam pa ste/_/ngan song thams cad rnam sbyong ba/_/mgon po sems can kun gyi mchog_/sems can thams cad rab grol byed/_/nyon mongs g.yul du gcig dpa' ba/_/mi shes dgra yi dregs pa
[\[27b.2\]]'joms/_/zhes pa la sogs pa smos te/_mtho ris dang thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyi don du sbyin pa la sogs pa'i sgo nas sgrub par byed de/_dman pa ngan song gsum las kyang thar pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i chos rnams bstan nas rgyu dang 'bras bu sbyong zhing /_sems can kun gyi don
[\[27b.3\]]byed pas mchog go/_/sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa mkhyen pas blo'i rim pa dang sbyar nas nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba las grol bar byed do/_/chos ji snyed cig bshad kyang nyon mongs pa 'dul ba'i gnyen por gcig go/_/des mu stegs la sogs pa zil gyis gnon pas
[\[27b.4\]]dregs pa 'joms pa'o/_/gzhan gyi nyon mongs pa de ltar 'joms na/_'o na gzhan 'dul ba'i gzugs su ji ltar ston zhe na/_dpal ldan blo dang sgeg par ldan/_/brtan po mi sdug gzugs 'chang ba/_/zhes smos te/_bdag dang gzhan gyi dpal du gyur pas shes rab chen po'i blo dang
[\[27b.5\]]ldan pa/_blta na mdzes par mdzad pas na sgeg pa'o/_/don mi 'gyur bar brtan la/_zhi bas mi 'dul ba la bdud la sogs pa zlog pa'i 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs 'chang ba'o/_/de yang gar la mos pa la gar du ston pa'i phyir/_/lag pa brgya po kun bskyod cing /_/gom pa'i stabs kyis
[\[27b.6\]]gar byed pa/_/dpal ldan lag pa brgyas gang la/_/nam mkha' khyab par gar byed pa/_/zhes smos te/_tshangs pa 'dul ba'i gar lag pa brgya sprul te bsgyur ba dang /_tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa'i mthus lag pa brgyar sprul te/_/nam mkha' khyab tshad du 'gro ba'i don byed pa'o/_/lus
[\[27b.7\]]kyi rdzu 'phrul gzhan yang ston pa'i phyir/_/sa yi dkyil 'khor gzhi yi khyon/_/rkang pa ya gcig mthil gyis gnon/_/rkang mtheb sen mo'i khyon gyis kyang /_/tshangs pa'i yul sa rtse nas gnon/_/zhes smos te/_gling bzhi'i khyab 'jug gis 'dul ba de'i gnyen por gling bzhi ri rab
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]dang bcas pa rkang pa ya gcig gi mthil gyis mnan pa ste/_gling bzhi chung du ma song la zhabs che ru ma song ngo /_/gyen la ni zhabs kyi mthe bong gis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten dus gcig tu gnon to/_/snga ma ltar che chung du ma song ba'i rdzu 'phrul ston to/_/'khor ba 'di ma
[\[28a.2\]]spangs par ji ltar grol bar 'gyur zhe na/_/don gcig gnyis med chos kyi don/_/dam pa'i don de 'jigs pa med/_/rnam rig sna tshogs gzugs don can/_/rnam shes sna tshogs rgyud dang ldan/_/dngos don ma lus rnams la dga'/_/stong pa nyid dga' 'dod chags blo/_/srid pa'i 'dod
[\[28a.3\]]chags spangs pa ste/_/srid gsum dga' ba chen po pa/_/zhes smos te/_gnyis su med pa ni don dam pa chos kyi sku ni don dam pa ste/_gzhan gyis mi thub pas 'jigs pa med de/_thugs rje dang smon lam gyi shugs kyis rnam rig sna tshogs kyi gzugs su sprul lo/_/kun gzhi rnam shes
[\[28a.4\]]nyid rnam rtog sna tshogs dang 'brel pas rgyud do/_/de ltar dngos po 'khor ba'i don ma lus par mdzad pa las dgyes shing /_don dam par stong pa nyid la dga' zhing chags pa'i blos khams gsum gyi 'dod chags rang kha ma las grol bas spangs pa'o/_/shes rab chen pos srid pa las
[\[28a.5\]]grol kyang thugs rjes der sprul nas don mdzad pa la dga'o/_/don mdzad pa'i tshe sku'i gzi mdangs ci 'dra zhe na/_sprin dkar dag pa bzhin du dkar/_/'od bzangs ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od/_/nyi ma 'char ka'i dkyil ltar mdzes/_/sen mo'i 'od ni shas cher dmar/_/zhes smos te/_don lam
[\[28a.6\]]gos pa'i mtshan ma 'od kha dog sprin ltar dkar zhing /_ye shes kyi 'od zer 'phro ba'i dpe ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od lta bus ma rig pa'i mun pa sel zhing gdung ba tshim par byed pa'o/_/de las kyang ye shes drug ro gcig pa'i rtags su 'od kha dog drug dang ldan pa'i sku mnga' ste/_'gro ba la thugs
[\[28a.7\]]rjes chags pa'i rtags su phyag gi sen mo dmar ba'o/_/rgyan gyi khyad par ji lta bu zhe na/_cod pan bzang po mthon ka'i rtse/_/skra mchog mthon ka chen po pa/_/nor bu chen po 'od chags dpal/_/sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyan dang ldan/_/zhes smos te/_mtha' gnyis las rgyal ba'i
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]rtags su dbu la rin po che'i cod pan bzang zhing mdzes pas brgyan pa'o/_/skra yang gzhan pas mchog tu gyur pas rin po che mthon ka ltar sngo zhing mdzes pa'i skra mnga' ba'o/_/'gro ba'i don rdzogs par mdzad pa'i rtags su thugs ka na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po ches brgyan cing /_
[\[28b.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa dpag tu med pa mnga' ba'i rtags su ba spu re re la ye shes sems dpa' re re gsal zhing mdzes pas brgyan pa'o/_/de lta bu de la lam gyi khyad par ji lta bu mnga' zhe na/_/'jig rten khams brgya kun bskyod pa/_/rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i stobs chen ldan/_/de nyid
[\[28b.3\]]dran pa chen po 'chang /_/zhes smos te/_'jig rten khams brgya ni mtshon pa tsam ste/_mtha' yas par bskyod par mdzad do/_/bskyod nas ci mdzad na rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la sogs pa'i sgo nas 'gro don mdzad de/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni 'dun pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa rdzu
[\[28b.4\]]'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_sems kyi ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o/_/de yang don mi bsnyel ba'i dren pa chen po 'chang ste/_gzhan yang byang chub kyi yan
[\[28b.5\]]lag gang zhe na/_dran pa bzhi po ting 'dzin rgyal/_/byang chub yan lag me tog spos/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan mtsho/_/lam gyi yan lag brgyad tshul rig_/yang dag sangs rgyas lam rig pa/_/zhes smos te/_dran pa bzhi ni lus dran pa nye par gzhag pa dang /_sems dang /_

[\[28b.7\]]'grus dang /_dga' ba dang /_shin tu sbyangs pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_btang snyoms so/_/de lta bu'i sgo nas 'gro ba'i don byed pa dang /_'phags pa mnyes par byed pas me tog spos so/_/der yang ma zad de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sogs te/_de bzhin

[\[29a.1\]]gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho tsam gyi gzhir rje btsun nyid 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang bsgom lam gyi gnas skabs na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ste/_yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /_rtog pa dang /_ngag dang /_las kyi mtha' dang /_'tsho ba dang /_rtsol ba dang /_dran pa dang

[\[29b.1\]]su med pa'i ye shes te/_de la rje btsun nyid ngang gis gnas shing /_nges par 'byung ba'i chos kun ston pa la yang mkhas pa'o/_/nyid kyang lam de la gnas pa'i tshul ston te/_gzhan dang 'dra ba'i phyir ro/_/gdul bya rnams la ji ltar 'tsham par 'byung ba'i chos ston par mdzad do/_/des

[\[31a.1\]]rnam shes don ni 'gag par byed/_/ces smos te/_snying rje chen po dang ldan pas zhi ba'i mtha' la mi gnas shing /_shes rab chen po dang ldan pas srid pa'am 'khor ba la mi gnas te/_thabs de lta bus 'gro ba'i don byed do/_/'o na mtshan mar 'dzin pa can du mi

[\[32a.1\]]gsum pa/_/gsang sngags don kun skyed pa po/_/thig le chen po yi ge med/_/stong pa chen po yi ge lnga/_/thig le stong pa yi ge brgya/_/zhes pa thabs dang shes rab las byung ba'i chos kyi ngo bo nyid brjod du med pas yi ge med pa'o/_/rgyu che ba thabs dang shes rab

[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]do/_/de bzhi yang spros pa phyogs re bcad pa'i yon tan gyi cha nas bzhir bshad kyis/_don du na thig le chen po yi ge med pa'o/_/yang spyi bo bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo na byang chub kyi sems thig le cha bcu drug tu gnas te/_de las kyi phyag rgya'i thabs kyi bye brag rnams la brten te/_spyi bo bde

[\[32b.4\]]bsgoms pas rnam rtog gi yan lag med pa/_brjod pa'i rtsis las 'das pa'o/_/ting nge 'dzin bzang ba ni bsam gtan bzhi la lta'i ting nge 'dzin lta bu'o/_/nyid kyang de dang ldan zhing gzhan gyi ting nge 'dzin bsam gtan gyi yan lag rnams kyang shes te/_de yang 'dod pa'i khams na lhag

[\[64a.3\]]yi ge sbyor ba ni/_/a ba d+hU tI'i don brtags nas/_/ye shes chen po ma lus pa'i/_/'di nyid la ni 'bras longs spyod/_/de dag mgrin pa'i 'khor lo ste/_/thog ma tha mar rtsa las grub/_/de nyid longs spyod 'khor lo ste/_/gang nas rnam par shes la 'bab/_/tshigs
[\[64a.4\]]su bcad pa bcu drug po/_/phyag na rdo rjes tha mi dad/_/de nyid grub pas thabs su brjod/_/gzhan yang shes rab brjod bya ste/_/de nas shAka thub ces pa yi/_/bcom ldan 'das zhes pa yi mthar/_/nam mkha' 'di ni 'khor lo drug_/'dzum pa gnyis gnyis gzhan don
[\[64a.5\]]te/_/'khor lo drug la rtsa re re/_/'gog pa'i tshul gyis nam mkha' 'gengs/_/shes rab don 'byung gsal bar 'grub/_/'jig rten gsum ni rnam pa gsum/_/tshangs pa rkang gi bu ga 'gengs/_/gyen du gsang ba'i bug gnyis nas/_/gsum pos so so gsum
[\[64a.6\]]snang byed/_/de ltar 'gro ba rdo rje 'dzin/_/legs so zhes ni brjod pa'o/_/snying rjes 'gro ba mngon du byas/_/de ni yan lag drug bzhi'o/_/phyag rgya chen po'i yan lag rdzogs/_/snying rje'i dus ni bcu drug pa'o/_/ye shes lus kyi mtshan brjod pa/_/brdar btags

[\[64b.1\]]su bcad pa'i don/_/nam mkha' 'di ni 'khor lo drug_/shes rab don 'byung gsal bar 'grub/_/gsum pos so sor gsum snang byed/_/de ni yan lag drug gi gzhi/_/phyag rgya chen po'i yan lag rdzogs/_/de dag ston mas nga bla ma/_/tshigs su bcad pa de drug gis/_/thub

[\[64b.6\]]don dam bden pa ste/_/de ni ma skyes pa yi chos/_/sgyu ma yis ni yang dag bsdus/_/gang phyir mngon par rtogs pa ru/_/sems can rnams la yi ge'i don/_/de phyir rtag tu rab bshad pa/_/zab mo'i man ngag dbang las so/_/nye bar bsdus pa 'di dag gis ni/_gsol

[\[65a.1\]]'dra'i de nyid mang po de/_/dang po yi ge brda ru byas/_/rnal 'byor chen po bcu gnyis te/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid kyis gsungs/_/de yi mtshan nyid rgyas bshad bya/_/shes dang shes par bya ba'i don/_/gus pas de yi mtshan nyid bshad/_/rtag tu gnyis med

[\[65b.1\]]rgyas yang dag gnas/_/de yi ming ni gzhan dag kyang /_/'jam dpal gzhon nu zhes byar btags/_/d+hI/_gnas pa'i sgra yis yang de bstan/_/sum cu rtsa gsum yi ge'i gtso/_/oM oM yi ge tshangs pa'i mchog_/ba/_gnas pa khams gsum nyid du'o/_/dzra/_rol pa gang phyir

[\[65b.4\]]gyis/_/na/_mi bden bden pa'i rtog pa med/_/kA/_lus kyi las ni rtag tu byed/_/ya/_gang las sangs rgyas mchog 'byung ba'o/_/bA/_bag chags gang phyir rtag tu gnas/_/gI/_brjod de thar pa'i rgyu ru'o/_/shwa/_dbugs dbyung ba ni rlung chen po/_/ra/_bu gar rnal 'byor stobs kyis

[\[68a.1\]]dam pa'i bdag ni dpal zhes bya/_/de bzhin nyid bdag mdzod spu zhe'o/_/bden par smra ba brtag pa'o/_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi lha'o/_/gzhan gyi tshig min mthong bar dka'/_/gnyis su med pa yon tan tog_/_

[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]ri bong can/_/zag pa zad pa grags chen po/_/dge slong zhes pa gtsug nor bu/_/'dod chags bral ba zhes grags pa'o/_/grub pa zhes pa seng ge'i 'gros/_/bde ba rnyed pa dang ba'i ming /_/'jigs med thob pa zhes pa ni/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam rgyal don/_/bsil bar
[\[68b.2\]]gyur pa shes rab brtsegs/_/rnyog med pa ni legs gnas pa'o/_/rig pa spyod pa phun sum tshogs/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros mtshan/_/bde gshegs shes pa yan lag skyes/_/'jig rten rig pa'i mchog ces pa/_/bdud rtsi blo zhes pa yi mtshan/_/bdag gir mi 'dzin

[\[68b.4\]]tog_/ye shes 'ba' zhig las byung ba/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i mtshan/_/shes rab mtshon chen rnam 'joms pa/_/mi yi theg pa zhes pa'i mtshan/_/dam chos zhes bya bde ba'i lag_/chos rgyal zhes pa'i mtshan yang ni/_/de bzhin ye shes mdzad pa'i blo/_/gsal ldan

[\[69a.1\]]chen po zhes bya zla ba'i don/_/ye shes ldan ni gsal ba'i ro/_/yod med shes zhes bya ba ni/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i tog_/tshogs gnyis tshogs ni bsags pa'o/_/lugs las bzlog dpal zhes bya'i mtshan/_/rtag pa zhes bya snying po'i dpal/_/_

[\[69b.1\]]bar byed ni rnam rol pa'o/_/rnam par snang ba klu yi 'od/_/'gro ba'i mar me zhes bya ni/_/me tog ri zhes bya ba'i mtshan/_/ye shes skar ma glu dga' can/_/gzi brjid chen po dri dbang phyug_/'od gsal ba ni shin tu gsal/_/rig sngags rgyal ni stobs kyi lha/_/sngags

[\[72a.1\]]ming /_/rang gi ye shes bdag nyid che/_/gnas pa ma yin mi gnas min/_/gsang nor thig le'i rgyud las so/_/rdo rje hUM ste hUM zhes pa/_/bsam gtan bzhi pa'i rnam grangs te/_/suM b+ha ni la sogs pa'i sngags/_/de nyid bsdus pa'i rgyud las so/_/mtshon du

[\[72b.1\]]bas sems ni 'gugs pa'o/_/rdo rje 'bebs zhes la sogs pa/_/khro bo bzhi yi ming yin te/_/rtag tu rnal 'byor dbang po las/_/rtag tu rdo rje dbab par bya/_/de bzhin gzhan yang 'bebs pa che/_/spyod yul thim par longs spyod do/_/mig brgyas thams cad mthong ba dag_/_

[\[73a.1\]]bzangs dpal gyi rgyud las bstan/_/'on kyang de kun brjod pa ni/_/gsang ba la sogs tshig gi rim/_/nges par grags pa zhes pa'i tshig_/nges par 'byung nas 'og tu song /_/zhugs pa'i sgra ni rgyu ba ste/_/dpa' bo gcig pa'i rgyud las so/_/rdo rje
