[\[86a.7\]]'khor lo/_/de yi dbye ba bstan par bya/_/rnam par snang mdzad che zhes pa/_/byang chub sems kyi rdo rje ni/_/lnga yi rang bzhin drug pa ste/_/rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor lha dang mtshan/_/gtso bo'i thugs ka'i ye shes sems/_/'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/_/mtshan
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]rnams rnam pa gnyis su bzhed/_/de yi thugs ka'i zla dkyil na/_/mtshan ni rnam pa gnyis yin te/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas dang a las byung /_/de steng a la rnam gsum ste/_/a ni yig 'bru kun mchog dang /_/don chen zhes ni 'byung ba dang /_/yi ge dam pa zhes pa gsum/_/de ltar de
[\[86b.2\]]dag gsum po ni/_/mtshan mchog rnam pa bdun du bzhed/_/gsang ba'i yum bzhi'i rnams la ni/_/khong nas byung dang skye med gnyis/_/satwa badzri ma yi mtshan/_/tshig tu brjod pa spangs gcig pu/_/rat+Na badzri ma yi mtshan/_/brjod pa kun gyi rgyu mchog nyid/_/d+harma badzri ma yi mtshan/_
[\[86b.3\]]tshig kun shes ni 'byung ba dang /_/rab tu gsal byed ma dang gnyis/_/karma badzri ma yi mtshan/_/de dag la ni mtshan drug ste/_/dang po tha ma gnyis gnyis so/_/rgyal ba lnga la tshan gsum gsum/_/tshig rkang dang po gnyis gnyis so/_/gong ma gong ma la gnyis gnyis/_/'og ma
[\[86b.4\]]'og ma re re la/_/mchod pa chen po chags chen nas/_/khro ba chen po dgra che'i mthar/_/rgyal rnams bco lnga yum bzhi drug_/nyi shu rtsa gcig dag tu bshad/_/'dod pa che dang bde ba che/_/rdo rje sems dang rgyal po gnyis/_/dga' ba che dang mgu che gnyis/_/chags pa dang ni
[\[86b.5\]]legs pa'i mtshan/_/tshig rkang gnyis la bzhir bzhed de/_/byang chub sems kyi mtshan rnams so/_/gzugs che lus kyang che ba nas/_/dkyil 'khor chen po yangs pa yin/_/tshigs su bcad pa gcig la ni/_/sems dpa' bzhi ste mtshan rnams lnga/_/gzi brjid mchog che lus che gnyis/_/de dag
[\[86b.6\]]dbang bskur sems dpa' bzhi/_/shes rab mtshon chen 'chang ba nas/_/snang ba chen po gsal che'i mthar/_/tshigs su bcad pa gcig la ni/_/sems dpa' bzhi ste mtshan mchog bdun/_/rkang pa dang po rdo rje chos/_/mtshan mchog gcig tu shes par bya/_/rnon po la ni
[\[86b.7\]]gnyis yin te/_/nyon mongs lcags kyu che dang mchog_/rgyu la grags chen snyan grags gnyis/_/smra la snang che gsal che gnyis/_/ye shes sems dpar grags pa yin/_/mkhas pa sgyu 'phrul che 'chang nas/_/sgyu 'phrul chen po mig 'phrul mthar/_/tshigs bcad gcig
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]la sems dpa' bzhi/_/mtshan rnams drug tu bzhed pa yin/_/mkhas pa sgyu 'phrul che 'chang gnyis/_/rdo rje las su shes par bya/_/sgyu 'phrul che dang don grub pa/_/rdo rje bsrung ba'i mtshan yin no/_/lhag ma gnyis la re re'o/_/sems dpa' de dag bzhi po ni/_/las
[\[87a.2\]]kyi sems dpa' rnams yin no/_/sems dpa' bcu drug rnams la ni/_/tshigs su bcad pa phyed dang bzhi/_/mtshan rnams nyi shu rtsa gnyis te/_/sems dpa'i bsdus don de yin no/_/sbyin bdag chen po zhes pa nas/_/smon lam ye shes rgya mtsho'i bar/_/pha rol phyin bcu'i
[\[87a.3\]]tshigs bcad gnyis/_/lha mo brgyad dang sgo mar bzhed/_/sbyin bdag chen dang gtso bo gnyis/_/sgeg mo yi ni mtshan yin no/_/tshul khrims chen dang 'chang mchog ni/_/phreng ba ma la gnyis su bzhed/_/bzod chen 'chang dang brtan pa gnyis/_/glu ma yi ni mtshan yin no/_/brtson 'grus
[\[87a.4\]]che dang brtul ba gnyis/_/gar mkhan ma yi mtshan yin no/_/me tog ma la mtshan gcig ste/_/bsam gtan chen po'i ting 'dzin gnas/_/shes rab che dang lus 'chang gnyis/_/bdug pa ma yi mtshan yin no/_/bsam gtan zhes pa mar me ma/_/thabs chen zhes pa dri
[\[87a.5\]]chab ma/_/stobs ni dad sogs rnam pa lnga/_/ye shes rgya mtsho mthong sgom gnyis/_/yan lag bdun dang 'phags lam brgyad/_/stobs dang ye shes sgom par bzhed/_/gsang mchod la brgyad phyi la lnga/_/sgo ba la gnyis spyir bco lnga/_/byams chen rang bzhin zhes pa nas/_/_
[\[87a.6\]]mkhas pa chen po thabs che'i bar/_/tshig rkang bzhi la rim bzhin du/_/shar phyogs gnas pa'i skal bzangs bzhi/_/tshig rkang dang po byams pa yin/_/snying rje dang ni blo mchog gnyis/_/'jam dpal gyi ni mtshan yin no/_/spos glang shes rab blo chen gnyis/_/mkhas pa
[\[87a.7\]]che dang thabs che gnyis/_/ye shes tog gi mtshan yin no/_/lho yi sems dpa' rnam bzhi ni/_/rdzu 'phrul stobs ldan bzang skyong gi/_/shugs chen mgyogs pa chen po ni/_/blo gros rgya mtsho'i mtshan yin no/_/rdzu 'phrul chen po cher grags pa/_/blo gros mi bzad pa yi mtshan/_/_
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]spobs pa brtsegs pa zhes bya ba/_/stobs chen pha rol gnon gcig pu/_/nub kyi phyogs kyi sems dpa' bzhi/_/srid pa'i ri bo che 'joms nas/_/'jigs chen 'jigs par byed pa'i mthar/_/mthu chen thob dang ngan song 'dren/_/mya ngan 'joms dang dra ba can/_/go rims bzhin
[\[87b.2\]]du tshig re la/_/mtshan yang re re dag tu 'dod/_/byang phyogs kyi yang sems dpa' bzhi/_/mgon po rigs mchog chen po nas/_/theg pa chen po tshul mchog mthar/_/go rims bzhin du legs sbyar te/_/mgon po rigs dang mchog chen gnyis/_/zla 'od gzhon nu'i mtshan
[\[87b.3\]]yin no/_/'od dpag med dang nam mkha' mdzod/_/sgrib pa rnam par sel dang gsum/_/tshig gsum mtshan gsum go rims bzhin/_/tshigs bcad dag ni bcu bzhi ste/_/mtshan don brgyad cu rtsa drug bzhed/_/rigs bsdus tshe na dbus dkyil 'khor/_/bde gshegs
[\[87b.4\]]dkyil 'khor lha rnams ni/_/seng ge dang ni rab gsal byed/_/thub pa dang ni me tog dang /_/me tog mdzes dang spyan bzang po/_/kun ded dpon dang phyag rgya che/_/stobs po che dang rgyu skar rgyal/_/sman pa dang ni grags pa dang /_/rgyal mtshan dang ni 'od zer che/_/grol phung dang ni rnam snang
[\[87b.5\]]mdzad/_/nyi bzang po dang zla ba bzang /_/'od zer can dang 'od 'phro bzang /_/mya ngan med dang de bzhin skar/_/'od 'phro 'dzin dang yon tan 'od/_/don ston pa dang mar me ldan/_/rab bzang dang ni sman bzang po/_/dpa' bo dang ni mdzod spu dang /_/brtan po dang ni dpal gyi lha/_/_
[\[87b.6\]]mthong bar dka' dang yon tan 'od/_/skra can dang ni grangs can dang /_/tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang brtan pa'i mtshams/_/rig pa ldan dang 'od mdzad pa/_/ri bo che dang rdo rje che/_/rgyal min dang ni 'jigs med pa/_/rin po che dang pad+ma dang /_/stobs sde can dang me tog 'od/_/ye shes
[\[87b.7\]]'od dang lha chen po/_/tshig gi bdag dang snang mtha' yas/_/klus sbyin dang ni bstan pa'i rim/_/don yod mthong dang dbang po sbyin/_/mi lhung ba dang seng rgyal mtshan/_/rgyal ba dang ni tshogs pa po/_/dga' ba'i rgyal dang don 'dod pa/_/dga' bar mdzad dang chu yi lha/_/yon tan
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]lag dang spos glang po/_/don yod dbyangs dang thugs bzang po/_/zla ba dang ni ri bong can/_/grags chen pa dang gtsug nor bu/_/drug po dang ni seng ge 'gros/_/ngang pa dang ni rnam rgyal don/_/shes rab brtsegs dang legs gnas pa/_/blo gros dang ni yan lag skyes/_/_
[\[88a.2\]]bdud rtsi bu dang gzugs bzang po/_/ye shes can dang 'od zer can/_/dka' thub brtan dang bkra shis ldan/_/bde ba'i tog dang pad+ma dang /_/mi yi theg dang bde ba'i phyag_/ye shes mdzad blo dang 'od bral/_/tshangs pas byin dang rin chen mdzod/_/me tog lha dang legs pa'i don/_/_
[\[88a.3\]]chos dbang phyug dang blo gros grags/_/rdo rje tog dang pad+ma sgrub/_/rnam par rol dang du ma'i lha/_/ri yi tog dang 'od kyi tshogs/_/mi zad pa dang rin chen snying /_/bzod chen pa dang chos kyi blo/_/yid kyi yul dang yon tan grags/_/zla ba'i 'od dang gsal ba'i ro/_/seng ge tog dang
[\[88a.4\]]lus las bzlog_/snying po'i dpal dang nges pa'i tog_/glog gi 'od dang gser sbyin cha/_/gzhan gyis mi thub tog gi rgyal/_/rab tu grags dang brtson 'grus brtan/_/dpe bral grags dang gshin 'jigs 'gyur/_/dgra bcom lha dang mar me che/_/'jig rten 'od dang dri
[\[88a.5\]]dang po/_/yon tan 'dzin dang mun bral 'gyur/_/seng ge spro dang rin chen grags/_/skye rang bzhin dang yid skyes zla/_/legs par ston dang gzugs brnyan brgyan/_/nor bu bzang dang rin chen tog_/chos 'byung gnas dang rnam nges don/_/chos ster ba dang rin chen gnas/_/_
[\[88a.6\]]rgyal dbang po dang rin chen mnan/_/gnas pa'i blo dang bskal bral gdugs/_/rnam snang dpal dang seng ge sgra/_/rnam par rol dang klu yi 'od/_/me tog ro dang klu dbang can/_/ri dbang phyug dang shin tu bsam/_/stobs kyi lha dang yon tan phreng /_/klu yi phyag dang gzugs brnyan
[\[88a.7\]]brgyan/_/rgyal ba'i blo dang ye shes khyab/_/bdud rtsi sgra dang bden par smra/_/rab zhi blo dang mtha' yas gzugs/_/rnam snang mdzad dang rin chen tog_/'dod pa bral dang legs gzhibs pa/_/don yod sangs rgyas rtogs pa 'chang /_/me tog dang ni rdor dbang rgyal/_/gzi brjid
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]can dang don ston pa/_/tshe dpag med dang khro dbang phyug_/don gnas can dang mi shigs grags/_/mya ngan med dang dri ma bral/_/tshangs pa'i lha zhes bya ba'o/_/'di yi gzhung gi tshad dag kyang /_/tshigs bcad nyi shu rtsa lngar ni/_/tshig rkang gcig gis ma tshang ba/_/rgyal ba lnga la rim bzhin du/_
[\[88b.2\]]sum cu rtsa drug rtsa drug mtshan/_/bsdoms pas brgya dang brgyad cu gcig_/mi bskyod dkyil 'khor lha rnams ni/_/rdo rje 'jigs byed rgyud las gnyis/_/khro bo rnam rgyal sgyu 'phrul dra/_/phyag rdor dbang bskur rgyud las gnyis/_/rdo rje brgyan dang rig pa mchog_/bde mchog rgyan
[\[88b.3\]]dang rdo rje 'dus/_/don yod zhags dang rdo rje thod/_/gsang ba 'dus dang rnam snang dra/_/dam tshig che nang zla gsang thig_/gnyis med mnyam dang zla gsang thig_/rgyu de rnams las mtshan re re/_/sgyu 'phrul drug stong pa las gnyis/_/'byung po phyag rdor sa 'og rgyud/_/sgyu 'phrul dra
[\[88b.4\]]dang bde mchog rgyud/_/khro bo bde mchog sad dang ni/_/rgyud de rnams la mtshan re 'byung /_/khro bo rnam rgyal rgyud gnyis las/_/khro zla dang ni rta mchog rgyud/_/mtshan ni re re shes par bya/_/mi mnyam mnyam dang gsang rgyud de/_/rgyud de las ni bzhi 'byung ngo /_/dpal mchog dang po gsang ba
[\[88b.5\]]'dus/_/gsang ba mdzod dang gsang ba 'dus/_/rdo rje gsang rgyan nor bu gsal/_/de nyid 'dus pa'i rgyud dang ni/_/rgyud de rnams las mtshan re re/_/dam tshig chen po'i rgyud las gnyis/_/rnam snang mngon byang chub las gnyis/_/gnyis med mnyam dang khams gsum rgyal/_/rgyud de
[\[88b.6\]]las ni re re'o/_/rdo rje 'jigs byed rgyud las gnyis/_/phyag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i/_/rgyud las khro bo bzhi 'byung ngo /_/rdo rje snying po'i rgyud las gnyis/_/rdo rje thod phreng rgyud las gnyis/_/khro bo rnam rgyal rgyud las gnyis/_/dpung bzangs rgyud dang legs par grub/_/yi ge drug
[\[88b.7\]]dang 'bum pa dang /_/'jam dpal rgyud dang mngon dam rgyan/_/de bzhin khams gsum rnam rgyal dang /_/rgyud de rnams las re re'o/_/'jam dpal rgyud las gnyis 'byung ngo /_/'di yi gzhung tshad bstan pa ni/_/tshigs bcad bcu dang rkang pa gcig_/mtshan rnams bdun cu rtsa gcig ste/_/_
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]rgyal ba lnga la bcu bzhi re/_/rgyud sde so sor lha dbye byas/_/pad+ma gar dbang dkyil 'khor gyi/_/lha rnams nges par brjod pa ni/_/ye shes grags dang de bzhin rgyal/_/yon tan 'od dang khyad par che/_/zla ba rgyal dang pad+ma'i 'od/_/dka' thub rgyal dang mar me bzang /_/_
[\[89a.2\]]glog gi tog dang 'od kyi rgyal/_/gsal ba pa dang dpe bral grags/_/pad+ma grags dang me tog mtshan/_/spyan bzang mchog dang grangs med don/_/drag po sde dang bsod nams 'od/_/khyad par can dang thogs med blo/_/rA hu la dang ye shes 'od/_/grags dbang dang ni ye shes dbang /_/_
[\[89a.3\]]skar ma'i tog dang rA hu la/_/sman pa che dang sman pa'i rgyal/_/bsod nams dbang dang rgyu ba po/_/skar ma'i rgyal dang rgyal ba pa/_/nyi 'od 'char dang chos kyi mdzod/_/blo gros legs dang rgyal dbang po/_/rdo rje sde dang rdo rje brtsegs/_/legs par gnas dang rgyal ba'i blo/_/tshangs pa'i
[\[89a.4\]]dbyangs dang klu dbang po/_/yon gsal dbang dang mngon shes tog_/'od kyi tog dang dga' tshangs pa/_/sgra mi snyan dang rol pa'i gar/_/klu sbyin dang ni bde ba'i tog_/mkhas dang gzhan gyis mi thub dbyangs/_/rin chen 'od dang gsung dbyangs sbyin/_/seng ge dang ni nyi sna tshogs/_/ye
[\[89a.5\]]shes dpal dang pad phung po/_/me tog dang ni rnam mnan 'gro/_/bsod nams dpung dang mchog gyur blo/_/gsal ba dang ni zla mar me/_/mi bzad pa dang blo bzangs spyan/_/yan lag gtsug dang shes rab yul/_/mchog tu gyur dang rab 'joms zer/_/shes rab sbyin dang 'jam
[\[89a.6\]]pa'i dbyangs/_/tshig med spyod dang thu bo sbyin/_/dag pa dang ni ye shes gnam/_/bde gshegs 'od dang dbang po'o/_/thub pa 'chang dang lha zhes pa/_/'od zer bzang dang gzugs bzang po/_/rgyal po dang ni don grub mdzad/_/seng ge dang ni dri ldan dang /_/grags pa zhes dang rgyal
[\[89a.7\]]ba'o/_/mchog snying dang ni bsod nams zer/_/mdog bzangs dang ni nyan 'dod pa/_/mar me dang ni rin chen brtsegs/_/tshogs med lha dang sa yi bdag_/grol bar 'gro dang gser gtsug phud/_/sgra gcan bzang dang mi thub pa/_/rang bzhin thub dang zla ba'i 'od/_/gser
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]mdog bzang po dang dge ba/_/yon dbang lha dang chos kyi gdugs/_/yon tan legs dang grol zhes pa/_/ye shes rdzogs dang zhib mo'i blo/_/'od rab 'bar dang skyabs kyi sman/_/rnam grol tog dang shes rab mchog_/ye shes rgyal dang 'jigs pa'i gzugs/_/glo bur
[\[89b.2\]]'joms dang thogs med grags/_/bden par gsung dang ngag snyan pa/_/ri dbang grags dang chos brtsegs la/_/'gro ba'i 'od dang legs par brgyan/_/rang gi lus dang ye shes dag_/seng mche rno dang sel ba po/_/'gro ba mchod dang seng ge grags/_/chos kyi mtshan dang
[\[89b.3\]]skal ba bzang /_/mi bskyod mdog dang 'bar ba'i rgyal/_/rtogs pa dang ni spyan bzang po/_/don rig blo dang 'jigs med gser/_/dri yi 'od dang dga' ba'o/_/don yod 'gro dang khro thal mdog_/mchog gi gzugs dang nyan pa po/_/gtso bo grags dang drag po sbyin/_/nyi ma'i
[\[89b.4\]]lha dang gshin 'joms lhag_/shing rta'i 'gros dang blo gros bzang /_/gser 'od bcom dang skal ldan gtsug_/dbang phyug dang ni dga' ba bstan/_/mos pa 'joms dang ye shes mdzod/_/tshangs pa'i 'gros dang tsan+dan dang /_/mya ngan med dang seng ge'o/_/rtog gi yul dang
[\[89b.5\]]pad+ma'i snying /_/'od mtha' yas dang lha yi yul/_/bsod nams me tog rig pa'i lha/_/ye shes dbang dang tshangs pa gsal/_/rin chen phyag dang dbang po ldan/_/dpe bral 'gros dang the tshom ldan/_/mchod pa dang ni 'bar ba dang /_/sangs rgyas gdugs dang 'dam gyi mchog_/_
[\[89b.6\]]yid 'ong ldan dang bya grub pa/_/rma bya dang ni chos ldan dang /_/phan ldan gzugs dang ye shes dang /_/grags pa dang ni 'od zer 'bar/_/ma lus phan dang bai DUr snying /_/rgyu skar dang ni lha nyid ldan/_/ri bong can dang dra ba'i 'od/_/dge ba'i 'od dang yon tan zer/_/yid lags
[\[89b.7\]]pa dang rigs kyi 'od/_/spyod pa po dang rigs kyi mtsho/_/chos dbang phyug dang sku yi lha/_/yon tan stobs dang 'khor lo dbang /_/legs pa'i dbyangs dang legs par reg_/don grub pa dang gzi brjid dpal/_/kun mnyam nyid dang bdud rtsi dbyangs/_/bde bar snang dang
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]legs pa'i blo/_/rnam grol don dang khyad dbang phyug_/rol pa'i mchog dang lhag mthong nas/_/nyes pa spangs dang nyi ma'i 'od/_/bkra rgyal blo dang pad+ma'i mchog_/nyi ma'i 'od dang so sor gsungs/_/legs pa dang ni tshogs dbang po/_/'jigs pa bral dang ye shes srid/_/spobs pa'i mtshan nyid dang blo mchog_/ri bong can dang
[\[90a.2\]]rin chen zla/_/mi 'jigs pa dang me long che/_/tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang snyan pa'i gsung /_/shes rab 'od dang kun mnyam blo/_/rdo rje dang ni blo dang ldan/_/nam mkha'i dbang dang ngag dbang phyug_/yon tan dpal dang gnas kyi dpal/_/'phags pa'i 'od dang gsal ba'i shugs/_/gsal ba'i ro dang dri dbang phyug_/'dod can gdong
[\[90a.3\]]dang ye shes gsung /_/zhi gnas dang ni ye shes legs/_/rab tu 'dug dang chos rgyal mtshan/_/dri ma bral dang chos dbang phyug_/skal bral sgra dang gzi brjid 'od/_/drang srong dbang dang blo gros ngan/_/spobs pa'i 'khor lo dang zla zhal/_/nyi zla'i 'od dang yon tan mtsho/_/yon tan gsung pad bla med rtog_/bsod nams rtog dang spobs
[\[90a.4\]]pa'i yul/_/rigs pa bskyed dang rgyal rigs dang /_/rnam grol bsam dang dbang phyug go/_/mchog ces pa dang ye shes dbyangs/_/nam mkha'i mtha' dang mchod pa dang /_/dpung tshogs dpal dang yon tan zla/_/rA hu la dang bdud rtsi 'od/_/rin chen 'od dang zla ba'i 'od/_/seng ge stobs dang ye shes sku/_/'di yi gzhung tshad bstan pa ni/_/tshigs
[\[90a.5\]]bcad bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis so/_/mtshan ni nyis brgya bdun cu lnga/_/ye shes lnga po re re la/_/lnga bcu rtsa ni lnga lnga'o/_/rin chen 'byung ldan dkyil 'khor gyi/_/lha rnams ma lus bstan pa ni/_/don grub dpal dang yes nyi ma/_/don yod grub dang ri dbang brtsegs/_/dgras sbyin dang ni pad+ma dang /_/dgra bcom grags dang ye shes tog_/nyon mongs
[\[90a.6\]]'joms dang me zhes pa/_/bde ba dri dang dpe bral 'od/_/ri bo grags dang srid mtha' ston/_/zla ba dang ni rin chen zla/_/seng ge rgyal dang bsam gtan 'dod/_/dpe dang bral dang rnam par rol/_/yon tan rin chen dang don grub/_/dgra bcom grags pa rin chen 'od/_/srid pa bcings dang spyod lam 'phrul/_/mdzod spu dang ni spobs
[\[90a.7\]]pa grags/_/rdor nor bu dang tshe dpag med/_/nor bu bkod dang dbang chen po/_/yon tan 'od dang ri bo grags/_/'od zer bcu dang gnyis dang bral/_/klu yi stobs dang yid du 'ong /_/rin chen zla dang shugs can dang /_/gsal ba dang ni dga' dbang phyug_/gtsug phud 'od dang 'jigs bral dang /_/yon snying po dri med grags/_/_
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]gzi brjid zhing dang gdang ba grags/_/lha mang po dang legs par grags/_/sangs rgyas lnga 'dod rin chen gzugs/_/sangs rgyas stobs dang seng ge gshog_/grong chen mtho dang blo gros legs/_/'jig rten 'od dang rin chen lha/_/skal ldan shing rta yang dag rgyal/_dga' ba bkod dang 'od kyi mu/_/dka' thub che dang zla ba
[\[90b.2\]]dang /_/chos bstan pa dang mi thub zla/_ri bo 'od dang tshangs pa'i dbyangs/_/bden pa'i lha dang yon tan brtsegs/_/seng ge zla dang nor go cha/_/zla ba dang ni skra dang mtshungs/_/grags chen dang ni gzi brjid shugs/_/chos kyi grags dang dga' ba ldan/_/dri bzang po dang ri rgyal mtshan/_/dga' ba'i 'od dang mchod yon

[\[99a.5\]]nas/_/zhes pa'i bar gyis 'khor gyi mchod pa brjod par bstan to/_/de ni mgon po gsang ba'i bdag_/ces pa nas/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis bshad/_/ces pa'i bar gyis ched du brjod pa'i bstod pa bstan to/_/de dag ni ye shes kyi rjes su mthun pa'o/_/mtshan nas rjod pa'i

[\[108a.1\]]la 'jug pa'i sbyor ba ni ma yin te/_/dbang bskur bzhi yi grangs kyis ni/_/dga' ba la sogs rim zhes bya/_/zhes gsungs pa nyid kyis nang gi bdag nyid can du bya ba'i tha tshig ste/_gzhan du rgyas par bstan pas 'dir rgya cher ma spros so/_/'on kyang cung zad tsam
[\[108a.2\]]zhig bstan par bya ste/_dang por dga' ba tsam nyid de/_mchog tu dga' ba de las lhag_/dga' bral dga' ba gsum pa ste/_/bzhi pa lhan cig skyes pa brjod/_/ces gsungs pas gsum pas mtshon pa'i gzhi pa bstan pa'o/_/mtshon par byed pa dga' bral ni ma yin te/_dang po

[\[111a.1\]]dang /_smig rgyu dang /_chu zla dang /_brag ca dang /_mig yor dang /_sprul pa lta bur mkhyen cing gzhan la yang ston par mdzad pas/_gnyis med gnyis su med par ston/_/zhes bya'o/_/de'i rgyus yang dag pa'i mtha' la rnam par gnas shing /_byin gyi rlabs mnga' yang de

[\[116b.7\]]sangs rgyas sku ni ji ltar 'gyur/_/'di ltar sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan du/_/de ltar rnal 'byor smra bar rigs/_/zhes gsungs pas so/_/yid las skyes zhes pa ni phyag rgya chen po yid kyi rang bzhin du bstan pa ste/_de bas na/_de nyid gzugs rnams thams cad du snang ba'i dpal zhes
[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]bya'o/_/gzugs rnams ma lus 'chang ba po/_/zhes pa ni sngar gyi don 'di nyid de 'bras bu zung du 'jug pa 'di nyid dang /_don dang /_dpe dang /_rtags zung du 'jug pa'o/_/mtshungs pa med pa la sogs pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/_de nyid rgyu yin pas 'gran zla med cing
[\[117a.2\]]bdag po dang bral bas che bar grags pa'o/_/khams gsum gyi dbang phyug chen po ni yul med pa'i shes pa ste/_bsam du med pa'o/_/de yang /_bsam pa bzhin du mi sems pa/_/de ni bsam gyis mi khyab brjod/_/ces gsungs pas so/_/'phags pa'i lam ni drang po'o/_/shin tu mtho
[\[117a.3\]]ba ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa'o/_/de la gnas pa ni rang 'byung ste/_de yang /_rang 'byung rtogs pas bsam gtan min/_sangs rgyas sprul pa rgyun mi 'chad/_/ces gsungs pas so/_/dar ba chen po ni rgyas pa ste de las rang gi don du 'gyur ba'o/_/chos kyi tog ni rgyal mtshan te gzhan du'o/_/_
[\[117a.4\]]'jig rten la sogs pa ni 'bras bur bshad pa ste/_/'jig rten gsum na gzhon lus gcig_/ces pa ni/_bgres pa mi mnga' ba'i phyir chos kyi sku'o/_/gnas brtan ni theg pa gsum gyi lus su gyur pas so/_/rgan po ni thog ma med pas so/_/skye dgu'i bdag ni 'khor 'das kyi skyed mar
[\[117a.5\]]gyur pas so/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to/_/de gsal ba'i thabs bstan pa'i phyir/_'jig rten zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te/_'jig rten shes pa ni rnam par shes pa ste/_lung dang rigs pas so/_/'jig rten legs par shes pa ni de nyid sems
[\[117a.6\]]kyi khyad par du shes pa ste/_rdo rje slob dpon las so/_/ste zhes pa slob dpon gyi bye brag gzhan du bsdu ba'o/_/'jig rten slob dpon 'jigs pa med/_/ces pa snang ba slob dpon du gyur pa ste/_mngon zhen dang bral bas 'jigs pa med pa'o/_/mgon skyabs 'jig rten yid
[\[117a.7\]]gcugs pa/_/zhes pa ni rang sems bla mar gyur pas mgon po mya ngan las 'das pa dang /_'jig rten 'khor ba gnyis dang /_yid phyag rgya chen po tha mi dad par gcugs pa'o/_/skyabs dang zhes pa ni/_skyabs ni bla ma ste/_dang zhes pas de'i che ba dang drin dran par bya'o/_/skyob pa
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]zhes pa ni snang bas yid skyob pas dbang po rang snang du rol par bya'o/_/bla na med ces pa ni sems nyid bla ma bla na med pa ste/_skyo bar mi bya ba'i tha tshig go/_/de yang /_/ji ltar skyo bar mi 'gyur bar/_/thams cad rim gyis rim gyis bya/_/skyo bar gyur nas sangs rgyas nyid/_/nam yang
[\[117b.2\]]'grub par mi 'gyur ro/_/zhes gsungs pas so/_/nam mkha'i mtha' la longs spyod pa/_/zhes pa ni thams cad ye shes sems dpar shes par bya'o/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mtha'/_/zhes pa ni de lta bu nyid rang la gnas par bstan pa'o/_/ma rig sgo nga'i sbubs 'byed pa/_/zhes
[\[117b.3\]]pa ni bstan pa dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen la dgos pa med pa ma yin te/_dbul po'i gter bzhin du mtshon dgos pa'i phyir ro/_/des ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_srid pa'i dra ba 'joms pa po/_/zhes bya'o/_/dgos pa bzlog pa'i phyir dper na sA lu'i sa bon la srin bu ga snga zhugs pas ljang pa
[\[117b.4\]]skams par 'gyur ba bzhin/_dra ba ma rig pa bcom pas sngar bskyed pa'i nyon mongs pa ma lus par yang zhi bar byed pa'o/_/de las khyad par med pa ma yin te/_dper na dug la sngags kyis btab pas dug zhi ba dang sman du gyur pa gnyi ga 'byung ste/_de bzhin du thabs ye shes sems dpa'i
[\[117b.5\]]dus na 'khor bzhi pa'am/_sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad 'byung bas/_/'khor ba'i rgyu mtsho pha rol phyin/_/zhes bya'o/_/ye shes la sogs pa ni dri ma dang bral bar bshad par bya ste/_/ye shes dbang bskur cod pan zhes pa ni/_ye shes kyi bdud rtsi byin gyis brlabs pa'i bus dbang
[\[117b.6\]]bskur ba'i rigs lnga'i cod pan du gyur te/_can zhes pa ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bstan pa de dang po'o/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyan du thogs/_/zhes pa ni sku gnyis kyis slob ma'i 'khor lo bzhir byin gyis brlabs shing thig le rgyan dang ldan pa ste/_de bas na/_ni raM su yis yan
[\[117b.7\]]lag brgyan/_/zhes pa dang bla ma cod pan du gzung bar bya ba'i tha tshig kyang ngo /_/sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal zhes pa ni/_'du byed dang /_'gyur ba dang /_sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal gyis 'dus pa'i 'gro ba ste/_de las grol zhing bde ba chen po rnyed par 'gyur bas na/_gsum
[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]sel mtha' yas zhes bya'o/_/grol gsum thob ces pa ni/_the tshom du 'dzin pa dang /_du mar 'dzin pa dang /_phyogs char 'dzin pa la sogs pa ni bzhi pa'o/_/de lta bu'i rnal 'byor pa bya ba dang bral ba ston te/_sgrib pa ni nyon mongs pa la sogs pa'o/_/dus med rtogs
[\[118a.2\]]pas rgyun mi 'chad pa'o/_/yon tan ni sgrib pa spangs pa dang /_ye shes thob pa ste/_cod pan ni sangs rgyas so/_/de'i yang thod du gyur pa ni bla ma dang rdo rje 'dzin pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dam tshig dag ni thams cad las/_/bla ma mchod pa mchog yin te/_/sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog/_
[\[118a.3\]]dpal ldan 'dus pa'am gzhan du bstan/_/zhes gsungs so/_/dogs pa bzlog pa'i phyir/_khams gsum rin po cher gyur pa/_/slob dpon las ni mchog gzhan med/_/gang las bka' drin thob pa yis/_/mkhas pas dngos grub du ma thob/_/ces gsungs pas so/_/lus
[\[118a.4\]]kun las ni rnam grol ba/_/zhes pa ni 'khor 'das kyi bye brag gis dkar po'i chos dang /_dam tshig gi nor dang /_yul la 'dod pa dang /_sdug bsngal gyi 'jigs pa las grol bar 'gyur te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'khrul pa zhig pas gnyen po mi gnas pa'i phyir ro/_/nam
[\[118a.5\]]mkha' la sogs pa ni gzhan gyi gtso bor gyur pa'o/_/bzang ngan shes pa ni snod kyi bye brag mkhyen pa'o/_/dus shes pa ni bstan pa'i go rims mkhyen pa'o/_/dam shes pa ni 'khor ba'i skyon gyis ma gos pa'o/_/rtag tu don mdzad pa ni dam tshig dang ldan pa'o/_/dbang po shes pa
[\[118a.6\]]ni dus shes pa'o/_/rnam grol gsum la mkhas pa po/_/zhes pa ni dus gsum las rnam par grol ba'i thabs gsum la mkhas pa'o/_/nyid kyi thugs su chud cing gzhan la ston pas/_yon tan ldan zhing yon tan shes/_/gsungs pa'o/_/swa sti rgyud las skyes pa'i
[\[118a.7\]]rang bzhin du bshad pa'i phyir/_shes pa lnga'i khyad par ni bla ma la gus par 'byung ba dang /_rjes thob med par 'byung ba dang /_'khor ba las ni ring du gyur par 'byung ba dang /_sems la dbang bar 'byung ba dang /_zug rngu med par 'byung ba ste/_de yang gzhi bla ma dang /_dbang
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]dang /_/sgom pa dang /_rtogs pa dang /_brda las chos kyi de nyid shes pa dang /_nyams su myong ba dang /_rgyun ma chad pa dang /_sgro 'dogs chod pa dang /_sna tshogs rol mo las 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de rang dbang du gyur pa ste/_spyod pa'i khyad par ni 'dis 'gro bar 'gyur te/_snyan grags dge
[\[118b.2\]]dang zhes pa ni kun bzang dge ba'i spyod pa ste/_bla ma la brten par bya'o/_/dbugs 'byin chen po zhes pa ni/_sems dbugs 'byin pa'i gsang spyod do/_/dga' ston che zhes pa ni dga' ba ston pa'i rig pa'i spyod pa'o/_/dga' chen rol mo chen po ste/_/zhes pa ni dga' ba chen po'i nyams
[\[118b.3\]]kyis snang ba la rol mo lta bur spyod pa ste/_tshogs kyi spyod pa'o/_/bkur sti rim gro phun sum tshogs/_/zhes pa ni/_de kho na nyid dang ldan pa'i sems la sna tshogs kyi spyod pas bsnyen bkur bas phun sum tshogs pa rnyed par gyur pa ste bsnyen spyod do/_/de yang /_rtag tu ngu ba'i spyod pa bzhin/_/_
[\[118b.4\]]mi g.yo ba yi sems kyis ni/_/dngos grub ster ba'i bla ma la/_/'gro ba'i mgon po bsnyen bkur bya/_/zhes pa dang /_/bud med rab tu mdangs bzang ma/_/lo grangs bcu gnyis lon pa ni/_/dri dang me tog phreng brgyan pa'i/_/yon tan ske rags mA ma kI/_/shes rab can gyis byin brlabs
[\[118b.5\]]la/_/de yi dbus su mnyes par bya/_/zhes gsungs pa la sogs pa'i rgyas par bshad pa ste/_rig ma'i bye brag ni/_dbugs 'byin mchog dang bar ma dang /_/dri yi chu dang bcas pas kyang /_/rtag tu dus kyi khyad par gyis/_/rigs ldan rnams ni mchod par bya/_/dogs pa bzlog pa'i
[\[118b.6\]]phyir gsungs la/_rigs kyi sman pa'i 'du shes dang /_/'jigs pa'i 'du shes ma bskyed cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_sngags kyi spyod pa ni spyod pa'i mchog go/_/'di lta ste/_sngags kyi spyod pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa'o zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro/_/_
[\[118b.7\]]gzhan yang rang gi don dang phal cher gzhan gyi don du/_dag cing yon tan gyi ni gnas/_/sna tshogs yon tan phun sum tshogs/_/zhes pa la sogs pa nus pa dgug pa dang /_grub pa'i rnal 'byor la yang rung /_/zhes pa ni brda mtshon pa dang /_mi yi bu mo mthu chen gyis/_/zhes pa ni yon
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]tan gyis dgug pa dang /_lha rdzas btsun mo dgug pa'o/_/nus pa gal te med 'gyur ram/_/'dod pas gnod pa nyid 'gyur na/_/des ni mi yi bu mo bsten/_/zhes pa la sogs pas bye brag shes par byas la/_bsten par bya ba'i dgos pa ni/_nor zhes pa dang 'brel
[\[119a.2\]]to/_/gzhan yang /_lus kyi sbyin pa byas nas ni/_/phyis ni spyod pa yang dag brtsam/_/skal ldan skal min spyad nas ni/_/de yi sbyin pa gtang mi bya/_/zhes pas/_cung zad nus pa bskyed nas ni/_rol zhing grong du 'jug par bya/_/zhes pa dang 'brel to/_/gzhan yang bza' btung thob
[\[119a.3\]]pa dang /_bgrod dang bgrod min spang bar bya/_khrus dang gtsang sbra mi bya ste/_/grong gi chos ni spang mi bya/_/blo ldan sngags ni bzla mi bya/_/bsam gtan dmigs par mi bya ste/_/gnyid ni spang bar mi bya'o/_/dbang po dgag par mi bya ste/_/sha rnams thams cad bza' ba'o/_/rigs lnga la
[\[119a.4\]]ni mnyam par spyod/_/ces pa la sogs pa ni/_gnyis med ye shes sems kyis ni/_/mi bza' cung zad yod ma yin/_/zhes pas 'brel to/_/de ltar spyod pa bye brag ni gang zag gi rim pas rim dang cig car dang rang bzhin pa'o/_/mchog tu dga' ba la sogs pa ni bzhi pa'i don du bshad par bya
[\[119a.5\]]ste/_/mchog tu dga' ba ni dam par dga' ba ste/_/rnam gcod yongs gcod dang bral ba'o/_/de ston par mdzad pa ni/_mchog sbyin gtso bo zhes bya ste/_snying bo ni don gyi sangs rgyas so/_/des gang la bstan par bya ba yang grags bdag dpal ni byang chub sems dpa'o/_/bcom ldan ni de bzhin
[\[119a.6\]]gshegs pa'o/_/de'i yang skyabs kyi dam par gyur pa ni bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dngos grub 'byung ba'i gnas gzhan med pa'i phyir skyabs su 'os zhes bya'o/_/de ji ltar 'gyur ba ni/_'jig rten sgra ste zhes pas ma rtogs pa log par rtog pa dang /_the tshom mthar byed
[\[119a.7\]]pa'i don to/_/de nas gnyug ma ston pa'i phyir rab kyi mchog ces bya'o/_/da ni tha mar dge ba ston te/_sel ba po ni phyag rgya chen pos so/_/gtsug phud la sogs pa'i bye brag ni ye shes lnga dang ldan pa'o/_/gdong lnga zhes pa ni rigs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'o/_/gtsug phud lnga
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]dang ldan zhes pa ni de nyid gzhan gyi don du bstan pa'o/_/nges par du dge ba bstan te/_zur phud lnga pa zhes pa ni 'dod yon lnga pa'o/_/me tog ces pa ni dbang po'o/_/thod ces pa ni rgyan te bde ba chen por ro/_/mgo zlum dang brtul zhugs chen po gnyis ni tshangs par spyod pa brtul zhugs mchog
[\[119b.2\]]gi rtags te/_theg pa thun mong ba khyad par gyi bye brag gis so/_/'dir ni mtshan ma'i rten la phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pas ting nge 'dzin rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur ba'i phyir/_dka' thub mthar phyin pa ste tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya'o/_/de yang /_tshangs pa mya ngan 'das sangs rgyas/_/'jug
[\[119b.3\]]pas khyab 'jug tu ni brjod/_/rtag par dge ba bzhi pa ste/_/thams cad bdag nyid gnas pa kun/_/dam pa'i bde bde nyid do/_/zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro/_/nyon mongs pa mi spong ba la sogs pa ni dka' thub chen po ste/_phyag rgya chen po nyid nas smyon pa'i brtul zhugs mchog go/_/dang
[\[119b.4\]]por dge ba bstan par bya ste/_gtsang gnas zhes pa ni sku gsung thugs rdo rje'o/_/gnas pa dam pa zhes pa ni btsun mo'i b+ha ga'o/_/gau ta ma zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das so/_/nyon mongs pa mi mnga' ba bram ze'o/_/tshangs pa ni gzung bas stong ba ste/_dga' ba'o/_/gnyis pa ni 'dzin
[\[119b.5\]]pas stong pa ste mchog tu dga' ba'o/_/shes pa ni bde ba chen po ste rnyed pa'o/_/mya ngan 'das zhes pa ni dri ma dang bral ba'i lhan cig skyes pa'o/_/tshangs pa ni btang snyoms dang bral ba ste snying po len pas na thob pa'o/_/grol ba ni bzhi pa'o/_/thar pa ni bzhi pa'i man ngag go/_/rnal grol
[\[119b.6\]]lus ni bzhi pa'i dbang ngo /_/mtshan nyid gsum ni bshad zin to/_/rang gi ngo bo 'ba' zhig bstan par bya ste/_zhi ba gnyis ni nang dang nang du yang dag par gzhag pa'o/_/mya ngan las 'das pa gsum ni grags chen dang snying po don dang rdo rje 'chang ngo /_/bde sdug sel ba ni 'khor ba
[\[119b.7\]]gnyis kyi skyon dang bral ba'o/_/chags bral lus las 'das pa po/_/zhes pa ni nyan thos zhi ba'i sa las 'das pa'o/_/thub pa med pa ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ldan pa'o/_/dpe med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang ldan pa'o/_/mi mngon pa ni mi 'jigs pa'i
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]shes pas so/_/mi snang ba ni blo'i yul la mi snang ba'o/_/gsal byed min ni lus kyis gsal bar mi nus pa'o/_/phra ba ni rtogs par dka' ba'o/_/zag med ni mngon du rgyu dang bral ba'o/_/sa bon zhes pa ni ma rig pa'i bag chags dang bral ba'o/_/shin tu sad pa ni ma
[\[120a.2\]]rig pa'i gnyid sad pa'o/_/sad pa'i bdag ni rang bzhin gyis grol ba'o/_/kun shes ni chos thams cad do/_/kun rig ni don thams cad do/_/rnam par shes pa chos nyid 'das/_/zhes pa ni rtog dpyod dang bral ba'o/_/las byed pa ni gdul bya'i blo la snang ba'o/_/thog ma tha ma med pa ni
[\[120a.3\]]skye 'jig dang bral ba'o/_/dang po'i sangs rgyas rgyu med pa/_/zhes pa ni/_log rtog can kha cig dang po'i 'dren par gyur pa thabs gang la brten nas sangs rgyas zhes zer ba'i log rtogs bzlog par bya ste/_dper na nam mkha' la sprin dang /_'ja' tshon dang /_na bun dang /_khug rna dang /_
[\[120a.4\]]'byung ba chen po bzhi 'byung gi_/_nam mkha' rgyu rkyen gang las skye rtogs shig_/gal te nam mkha' las byung ngo zhe na/_da lta'i ri rab gling dang bcas pa 'di dag gis go phye ste gang gis rjes su song zhing bskyed/_gal te bskyed na nam mkha' snang bar bstan pa yin no/_/gal te
[\[120a.5\]]mtshan nyid mi mthun na chos 'di dag thams cad kyi mtshan nyid gang du yin/_gal te mtshan nyid gcig na tha dad pa med par 'gyur ba nyid do/_/de bzhin du dang por rang bzhin gyi chos las nus pa sna tshogs su 'char bar 'gyur te/_de nyid rgyu rkyen las skyes par snang mod kyi/_
[\[120a.6\]]rang bzhin gyi chos rgyu dang rkyen gang gis bskyed rtogs shig_/gal te tha dad na brtags pa dang brtags pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin gang dag yin/_mtshan nyid gcig ni 'gal ba gang la yod de med do/_/de bas na rang bzhin nyid las lhun gyis grub pa dang /_mngon du
[\[120a.7\]]gyur pa ni bde ba chen por ro gcig pa nyid do/_/de'i phyir/_dang po'i sangs rgyas rgyu med pa/_/zhes pas rgyu la mi gnas pa nyid du bstan pa yin no/_/blo dngos gcig tu 'brel par byed pa ni/_ye shes kyi mig gcig pa ste/_de la dri ma med pa'o/_/don mi 'byung ba ma yin te/_/ye
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]shes lus can de bzhin gshegs/_/zhes pa yin no/_/mi gnas pa nyid du bstan par bya ste/_tshig gi dbang phyug ni bcom ldan 'das so/_/rtogs pa dang ma rtogs pa'i bye brag gis don gnyis su ston pa na smra ba che zhes bya'o/_/smra ba'i skyes mchog gis thogs pa mi mnga' ba'o/_/_
[\[120b.2\]]smra ba'i rkyen ni dbang po dang sbyar bas ston pa'o/_/smra ba'i dam pa zhes pa ni thams cad sems kyi rang bzhin gcig pur ston pa'o/_/mchog gi gnas ni mchog gi dngos po grub pa'i gsung 'byung ba'i gnas so/_/smra ba'i seng ge ni nyam ming bas so/_/smra ba'i rgyal ni tshugs
[\[120b.3\]]pa med pa zhes pa phyogs su blta ba'i rigs kyis so/_/da ni snang ba'i rang bzhin du bshad par bya ste/_kun du blta ba ni ye shes brnyes pas kun du blta ba'o/_/mchog tu blta ba ni don dang chos so so yang dag par rig pa'i phyir ro/_/gzi brjid ni ye shes so/_/snang ba ni phung po'o/_/_
[\[120b.4\]]blta na sdug pa ni nyams myong du'o/_/'od bzang du ni snying po len pa'i dkyil 'khor du'o/_'bar ba ni rang gi shes pa nyid do/_/dpal be'u ni sems can thams cad la khyab pa'i ye shes so/_/lag na 'od 'bar ni 'jig rten gyi khams lag pa'i 'od la sogs pa rnams so/_/snang ba po
[\[120b.5\]]ni yang dag thams cad ye shes kyi snang ba'o/_/sman pa che mchog ni mi shes pas na nad rab tu 'joms pa'o/_/gtso bo ste zhes pa ni phyin ci ma log pa'i sman gyis gso bar mdzad pa'o/_/zug rngu ni dug gsum ste seng ldeng gi tsher ma lta bu'o/_/'byin pa ni dbang po la sogs pa
[\[120b.6\]]gsum gyis so/_/bla na med pa ni phyis mi 'byung bas so/_/sman rnams ma lus pa ni chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong ngo /_/ljon pa'i shing ni 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'o/_/'dir ni rje btsun pas gzung bar bya'o/_/des ci 'gyur zhe na/_nang do cog gi dgra che
[\[120b.7\]]ba/_/zhes gsungs pa ni/_nyon mongs pa de snyed kyi'o/_/rdo rje nyi ma snang ba che/_/zhes pa ni/_sems ye shes kyi dkyil du snang ba ste thabs so/_/rdo rje zla ba dri med 'od/_/ces pa ni de nyid rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo snang ba ste shes rab po/_/de gnyis tha mi dad pa ni bskyed rdzogs
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]gnyis zung du 'jug pa ste/_kho bo'i bla ma ri khrod dgon pa'i gzhung lugs so/_/de nyid bklag pa'i man ngag tu bstan par bya ste/_bdag nyid mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du zhugs pa'i tshe/_rigs kyi lha dang mthun pa'i ched du brjod par bya ba ni/_dbang bskur
[\[121a.2\]]ba dang dngos grub grub pa'i bye brag gis rang rang gi nga rgyal du zhugs la ji lta ba bzhin du byin gyis brlabs pa byas nas gnyis pa'am sgrub byed du gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas so so rigs kyi ched du brjod pa gdon pa dang /_rigs bsdus pa'i ched du brjod pa bstan pa'o/_/yang mchod
[\[121a.3\]]pa la sogs pas mnyes par byas nas phyag brgya bkrol ba'o/_/de'i man ngag ni rang gi sbyor ba dang ldan pas thabs dang shes rab la gnas te/_dbyangs yig dang po'i rang bzhin las/_/mchod sbyin sbyor bar byed pa yin/_/zhes gsungs pa ni man ngag ste/_bskyed pa'i tshul lo/_/_
[\[121a.4\]]sdu gu 'jig rten gsum gyi mchog_/ces pa ni/_rtags dang don gyi khyad par gyis srid pa gsum dang lus ngag yid gsum gyi mchog go/_/dpal ldan rgyu skar dkyil 'khor can/_/zhes pa ni mi 'char ba med pa dang /_de ma yin pa'i srid pa'o/_/gang du zhe na/_phyogs bcu zhes
[\[121a.5\]]pa ni gnas so/_/nam mkha' ni dus so/_/mthar thug pa zhes pa ni rgya de srid du chos kyi rgyal mtshan legs par 'dzugs pa ni skal ba dang dbang po'i bye brag gis snying bo dang sbun pa la sogs par ro/_/'gro na gdugs gcig yangs pa ste/_/zhes pa ni/_bla na med pa thob par 'dod
[\[121a.6\]]pa zhig rang la yod pa'i de nyid yod par shes pa dang /_ji lta ba bzhin rtogs pa'o/_/des snang ba med pa dang brtags par rang grol bar gyur pa ni spangs pa ste/_de'i snying po byams pa dang snying rje'i dkyil 'khor can no/_/de'i rnal 'byor ni/_/dpal ldan pad+ma gar gyi bdag ste/_nang rten
[\[121a.7\]]cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyis thams cad gar gyi rnam pa lta bur mthong ba'o/_/de gnyis ka la yang khyab bdag chen po rin po ches khyab pas na gdugs so/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi gzi brjid che/_/zhes pa ni snang grags
[\[121b\]]

[\[330a.3\]]pa'i man ngag bsgom par bya/_/des su phyag rgya'i dngos grub 'thob/_/yang na bskyed rim brtan pa yis/_/rdzogs pa'i man ngag gang bsgoms kyang /_/zla ba drug gis phyag rgya 'thob/_/rdzogs rim bskyed pa la brten nas/_/de nas rdzogs pa'i rdzogs pas ni/_/phyag rgya'i dngos grub
[\[330a.4\]]thob par gsungs/_/de ni slob dpon chen po'i gzhung /_/sbyor na lta ba gdeng 'gyur gtso/_/lhan cig ldog bya'i tshul du ni/_/byas nas the tshom mi skye zhing /_/ldog par mi 'gyur 'byung pos kyang /_/tshugs par mi 'gyur 'bras bu myur/_/de ltar ma gyur rnal 'byor pas/_/man ngag
[\[330a.5\]]nyams su lon par bya/_/man ngag bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis ni/_/mkha' 'gro ma yis lung ston pas/_/lung bstan pa yi dus su ni/_/lta ba man ngag zab mo ni/_/bstan pa bsgoms pas phyag rgya 'thob/_/mang na rnal 'byor rim pas ni/_/blo yi rab 'bring khyad par ni/_/bag chags
[\[330a.6\]]rkyen la sogs pa yis/_/rab 'bring dgu dang gsum dang ni/_/dbye bar bya ba'i don shes bya/_/rgyu rkyen 'dzom pa'i gang zag ni/_/skye ba 'di la lung ston pas/_/phyag rgya'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/rkyen ni rab tu mang gyur pa'i/_/rab kyi 'bring sogs ldan pa can/_/bar ma
